ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Outgoing IBFT- Money Transfer Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer complains about receiving error while adding or deleting favorite account for processing outgoing IBFT or facing issue in receiving funds in beneficiary bank account</p>

<p style="text-align:center"><strong>OR</strong></p>

<p>If customer transfer money from his Jazz cash account to easypaisa, upaisa or any other bank account, amount from jazz cash is deducted but not posted in the destination account we will make Outgoing IBFT complaint</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Error Deleting favorite - Outgoing IBFT &ndash; MW</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Error Adding favorite - Outgoing IBFT &ndash; MW</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Funds not received in beneficiary bank account - Outgoing IBFT - MW</li>
	<li>Scenario&nbsp;4 Amount transferred from Jazz cash A/c to Mobile account of Beneficiary Bank</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Handle as per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Error Deleting favorite - Outgoing IBFT &ndash; MW
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Mobile wallet account status &ldquo;Active&rdquo;</li>
		<li>bank account# that&rsquo;s being added as favorite</li>
		<li>Confirm the procedure customer is opting
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>*786#, option 1 for send money option, option 3, option 2 &amp; option 2</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Error Adding favorite - Outgoing IBFT &ndash; MW
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Mobile wallet account status &ldquo;Active&rdquo;</li>
		<li>bank account# that&rsquo;s being added as favorite</li>
		<li>Confirm the procedure customer is opting</li>
		<li>In this case customer has to wait 24 hrs. first because in this scenario some transaction auto pushed to beneficiary account which were stuck in system</li>
		<li>Customer can Delete by dialing *786# himself
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>*786#, option 1 for send money option, option 3, option 2 &amp; option 1</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Funds not received in beneficiary bank account - Outgoing IBFT &ndash; MW
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Ask transaction ID from customer to identify the transaction and will upfront guide the status of the transaction after required verifications</li>
		<li>If transaction is visible, then probe for the account number and validate it through transaction details and guide customer accordingly</li>
		<li>If transaction is not reflecting in CPS as completed, then view customer M-wallet account transaction status and guide customer accordingly i.e. transaction status as cancelled/failed</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>Handle as per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><strong><u>Extended Verification (if required)</u></strong></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>&nbsp;OR</strong></li>
	<li>Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>C2C Delay:</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This is to inform that Jazzcash has&nbsp;implemented&nbsp;30 mints delay on C2C Transactions via USSD now customer can cancel their transactions as well</li>
	<li>For IBFT outgoing transactions there are delay of 30 minutes on App &amp; USSD both, but customer can&#39;t cancel their transactions</li>
	<li>This change is implemented from&nbsp;<strong>12 August 2021 00:00</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong><u>USSD Flow</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer initiate the transactions as per the current flow.</li>
	<li>Customer can see its all pending transactions, which will be completed within 30 minutes.</li>
	<li>Customer can cancel the transaction within 30 minutes and get its money back instantly.</li>
	<li>All transactions which will be initiated from APP (new/old) regarding C2C will become instant for now.</li>
	<li>This change is also applicable on non-migrated merchant accounts as well. Please see the attached list of non-migrated in KMS (<strong>MSISDN/IMEI Search --&gt; List of Non-migrated Merchants (C2C &amp; IBFT 30Min)&nbsp;</strong>)who are using consumer app / USSD to access their accounts. However, this change is not implement on migrated / newly registered merchants and they will be able to send money instantly using their JazzCash Business App or USSD (*800#)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>IBFT Delay:</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Previously there was delay of 30 mints on IBFT Transaction on both App &amp; USSD and there was no mechanism to cancel the IBFT Transactions with in 30 minutes</li>
	<li>Now customer can cancel the transactions of IBFT with in 30 minutes from USSD by dialing&nbsp;<strong>*786*1*3*2#</strong></li>
	<li>IBFT Transaction from APP, would be instant now like C2C from the App, the delay is only on USSD Transactions.</li>
	<li>This change is implemented from&nbsp;<strong>31 August 2021 13:00</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong><u>USSD Flow</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer initiate the transactions as per the current flow.</li>
	<li>Customer can see its all pending transactions, which will be completed within 30 minutes.</li>
	<li>Customer can cancel the transaction within 30 minutes and get its money back instantly.</li>
	<li>All transactions which will be initiated from APP (new/old) regarding C2C and IBFT will become instant for now.</li>
	<li>This change is also applicable on non-migrated merchant accounts as well. Please see the attached list of non-migrated in KMS (<strong>MSISDN/IMEI Search --&gt; List of Non-migrated Merchants (C2C &amp; IBFT 30Min)&nbsp;</strong>)who are using consumer app / USSD to access their accounts. However, this change is not implement on migrated / newly registered merchants and they will be able to send money instantly using their JazzCash Business App or USSD (*800#)</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Customer M-Wallet is not active after registration
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer&rsquo;s M-wallet is not active after registration via *786# we will follow given process for issue identification &amp; resolution.</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: account is already registered in suspended state</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: customer&rsquo;s CNIC is expired</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: account is already in active state however customer M-wallet is not working as he does not have MPIN</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Customer data not shown in CPS</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: account is already registered in suspended state
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Consult system and if account is already registered in suspended state</li>
		<li>Account activation is on biometric no documentation is required.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: customer&rsquo;s CNIC is expired
	<ul>
		<li>Consult CPS &amp; ask customer if CNIC is renewed</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: account is already in active state however customer M-wallet is not working as he does not have MPIN
	<ul>
		<li>Consult CPS</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Customer data not shown in CPS
	<ul>
		<li>Confirm 1st transaction</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash Visa Debit Card Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer complaint regarding personalized visa debit card</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Personalized Visa Debit Card not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Request for personalized card is rejected but amount not reversed</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Name is not correct on card</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Fraudulent Transaction</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: Card Re-dispatch with Address change</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Card Re-dispatch without Address change</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: POS Dispute</li>
	<li>Scenario 8:&nbsp;<span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Internet session activation &ndash; Debit card (Visa)</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Handle as per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Personalized Visa Debit Card not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Request ID (optional)</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Order Date (optional)</li>
		<li>Transaction ID(as per CPS)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Request for personalized card is rejected but amount not reversed
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Request ID (optional)</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Order rejection date (optional)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Name is not correct on card
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Request ID (optional)</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Order Date (optional)</li>
		<li>Card PAN Number (last 4 digits)</li>
		<li>Required Name</li>
		<li>Name on card</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Fraudulent Transaction
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Card PAN Number (last 4 digits)</li>
		<li>TID</li>
		<li>Amount</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: Card Re-dispatch with Address change
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CustomerMSISDN</li>
		<li>CustomerCNIC</li>
		<li>Address</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Card Re-dispatch without Address change
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: POS Dispute
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Transaction ID</li>
		<li>Actual Amount</li>
		<li>Transaction Date</li>
		<li>Transaction Time</li>
		<li>Merchant name</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify">Scenario 8: Online Session Activation
	<ul>
		<li style="text-align:justify">Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li style="text-align:justify">Customer&nbsp;<span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">CNIC</span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Card Number</span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Card Expiry</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respextive scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Customers can order Personalized Visa Debit Card via portal available on our commercial website http://www.jazzcash.com.pk/visa-debit-card/. Now Business Centers and franchises can also process this request on customer behalf through website if any customer approaches them for this.</li>
	<li>Front-end staff need to clearly communicate to customer that he/she needs to enter MPIN for fee deduction of Rs 999&nbsp;and that the card will be delivered to the provided address within 10 working days.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Card Ordering Portal Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>To better facilitate our customers in case of any issue being faced while using &ldquo;Card Ordering Portal&rdquo; below mentioned complaint process has been developed for 4444 helpline. For better understanding we have developed Card Ordering Process guide which will enable helpline to better understand process and facilitate customers more effectively.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We need to ensure that complaint is after following complete probing required for complaint as per the scenario</li>
	<li>Complaint need to be forwarded by mentioning complete checklist</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Portal not working after 1st Step</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Passcode is not generated or passcode SMS not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: MPIN pop-up not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated</li>
	<li>Scenario 8: Payment Confirmation SMS not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p>TAT list as per scenario</p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>12 hours</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>12 hours</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Portal not working after 1st Step
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Passcode is not generated or passcode SMS not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: MPIN pop-up not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>2 business days</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 8: Payment Confirmation SMS not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Check any known issue received from helpdesk</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Portal accessed by CCR</li>
		<li>Time of issue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Portal not working after 1st Step
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Time of issue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: MPIN pop-up not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Description of issue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Transaction ID</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 8: Payment Confirmation SMS not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Transaction check in CPS</li>
		<li>Order placement check in portal</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Only one card can be ordered at a time</li>
	<li>Delivery time for card is 15 working days</li>
	<li>Confirmation SMS and Email will be send with Order ID</li>
	<li>Once a card order is placed, same customer cannot order another card for next 20 days unless previous request has been rejected or discarded Order Tracking</li>
	<li>Email &amp; SMS with tracking ID will be sent once card will be dispatch</li>
	<li>Customer can check status of the order through portal Returned Order</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 5540

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Suspend Account due to CNIC expiry
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>In case customer account is suspended in CPS due CNIC expiry or CNIC expiry is not updated then below handling will be followed by 4444 helpline agents</li>
	<li>Front end CCR will probe CNIC expiry from customer:&nbsp;
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>In case CNIC is expired as per Nadra Verisys, then CCR will guide customer to visit Nadra office for renewing his CNIC and after CNIC renewal he can call at 4444 for CNIC expiry updation</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Below are the two scenarios and their handling where CNIC expiry is already renewed however customer account is either blocked or CNIC expiry in not updated as per CPS:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Handling where CNIC Expiry Updation is required</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Handling where Account is suspended due to CNIC Expiry Updation</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123,6140
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per respsective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Account status in CPS</li>
	<li>CNIC expiry in CPS</li>
	<li>CNIC status in Verysis/NADRA portal</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respsective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>The call should be received from the same CLI on which the account modification regarding the CNIC expiry update or Suspend (suspend due to CNIC Expiry) to Active State is required.</li>
	<li>In case customer is calling from other CLI, then we need to guide him to call from same number</li>
	<li>We need to enter Card Expiry in DD/MM/YYYY format while generating complaint:
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CNIC expiry of active account</li>
		<li>Suspended accounts&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Verifications of Mother Maiden Name, POB and CNIC Expiry from NADRA verisys portal is mandatory but agent should not mention (Mother maiden Name &amp; POB) in e-front activity. Agent will only mention in notes of activity &ldquo;Mother name verified+ POB verified + CNIC Expiry verified as per NADRA&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Only available fields information need to filled in while generating required activity along with above mentioned verification remarks in notes ï‚· The front end agent will lock the activity by fulfilling the details needed along with verification from the NADRA verisys</li>
	<li>BBCR will check activity and after reviewing the remarks will cater it accordingly</li>
	<li>For Suspend (Suspend due to CNIC Expiry) to Active state system will sent auto SMS notification. For CNIC Expiry Update ISMS will also be sent to customer by BBCR team</li>
	<li>Front-end teams need to ensure correct details are updated in activity created. In case of wrong details, case need to be escalated to VMT through BBCR team</li>
	<li>After implementation of above process, customer can simply get their request processed by dialing 4444 helpline instead of visiting office</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong> OR</strong></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

	<li>Scenario 1: Customer want reversal where he missed the train/ late arrival, departure of training etc.</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Customer came with Double deduction complaint (Voucher/MA)</li>

Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Helpline agent need to check details in G2P in CPS using CNIC of Traveler before locking complaint in Efront or to confirm reversal status</li>
	<li>For refund made against Voucher payment, reversal of amount disbursement is done on Traveler CNIC used in reservation</li>
	<li>For Mobile Wallet and Debit/credit card as payment mode, reversal if applicable is made against respective initiated medium</li>
	<li>Customer needs to raise request to Railway for Change of CNIC due to any reason i.e. thump issue, receiver expired etc. in case of voucher payment reversal</li>
	<li>For Refund Policy details customer need to visit <a href="https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/RefundPolicy.aspx" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/RefundPolicy.aspx</a></li>
	<li>We should not guide customer calling on helpline to contact Railway helpline. Complaint can be locked at helpline or through Portal/Pakistan railway APP (available at Google Play store) as per process guidelines</li>

</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: NFC Complaints
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer is facing any issue in NFC (Near-Field Communication) services as follows</p>

<p>Information is available <a href="https://www.jazzcash.com.pk/vending/" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://www.jazzcash.com.pk/vending/</a>.</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine: Amount deducted but item not dropped</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine NFC Sticker Not Linking</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine: Vending Machine Not Working</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: NFC &ndash; NFC- Point of Sales (POS): NFC Sticker not responding</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: NFC &ndash; NFC- Point of Sales (POS): Payment deducted but receipt not received on POS</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: NFC- Point of Sales (POS): NFC sticker Lost Issue</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: NFC- Point of Sales (POS): Payment not successful</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine: Amount deducted but item not dropped
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>TID</li>
		<li>Transaction Date &amp; Time</li>
		<li>Amount</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine: NFC Sticker Not Linking
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Probe procedure followed by customer</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: NFC &ndash; Vending Machine: Vending Machine Not Working
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Machine location</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: NFC &ndash; NFC- Point of Sales (POS): NFC Sticker not responding
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Time and date of transaction</li>
		<li>Name &amp; Location of Merchant</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: NFC &ndash; NFC- Point of Sales (POS): Payment deducted but receipt not received on POS
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Time and date of transaction</li>
		<li>Name &amp; Location of Merchan</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: NFC- Point of Sales (POS): NFC sticker Lost Issue
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN&nbsp;</li>
		<li>&nbsp;CNIC</li>
		<li>Mother&rsquo;s Maiden name</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: NFC- Point of Sales (POS): Payment not successful
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>Time and date of transaction</li>
		<li>Name &amp; Location of Merchant</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li><strong>What is NFC?</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>NFC or Near Field Communication is a communication system between two electronics devices</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>What solution will be provided by JazzCash?</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>JazzCash will provide NFC stickers/tag for convenient payment solution</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li><strong>How NFC stickers will be used for payment?</strong>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>It will be linked with JazzCash for payment via Mobile Account. NFC stickers can be pasted on the back of smartphones to establish communication [Tap NFC stickers with vending or POS machine]</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>From where one can get NFC stickers/tags?</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>NFC stickers/tag will be available at Business Centers, Franchise Offices and JazzCash Retailers</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>What if, one does not have JazzCash Mobile Account?</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>For payment through NFC, one has to activate JazzCash Mobile Account and link NFC sticker/tag with it</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>What is NFC:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>NFC (Near-Field Communication) allows two devices placed within a few centimeters of each other to exchange data. In order for this to work, both devices must be equipped with an NFC chip. It is the quickest payment method.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>How NFC Technology Works:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>An NFC Sticker will be pasted on a customer&rsquo;s mobile phone, wallet or key chain, which will carry a unique identification number, that unique number will be linked with a mobile account. Once the NFC is linked with mobile wallet customers can walk into any partner retail store, cinema or university cafeteria and tap their NFC sticker on Point of Sale and payment will be made.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>NFC Payments Process via vending Machine:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer will tap the NFC Sticker on card reader of vending machine</li>
		<li>Customer will insert item number on the vending machine</li>
		<li>Customer will press enter, and keep its mobile phone unlocked, MPIN authentication message will pop-up</li>
		<li>After MPIN verification item will drop in the tray and customer will receive purchase message</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>NFC Linking (once)&ndash; Vending Machine</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Enter * from the dial pad on main menu</li>
		<li>Enter 20 from the dial pad on main menu</li>
		<li>Enter mobile number from the dial pad on main menu</li>
		<li>Tap your NFC Sticker on card reader</li>
		<li>Customer will enter MPIN</li>
		<li>Customer will receive confirmation message of successful linking</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 5574

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Acknowledgement time: 24 hours is over if transaction is in pending</li>
		<li>CRM for balance updated or not</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: OMO Load not Posted
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Acknowledgement time: 24 hours is over if transaction is in pending</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: IBFT Balance not Posted<strong> </strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Acknowledgement time: 6&nbsp;hours is over if transaction is in pending</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Reserve balance complaint handling for activities other than listed above will remain same (existing handling will be followed)
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Other possible cases include UBP payment (24 hours acknowledgement time)</li>
		<li>Jazzcash to Jazzcash transaction (2 hours acknowledgement time)</li>
		<li>Bank loan payment (2 hours acknowledgement time)
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Live call transfer on 14600 &amp; backend will give 4 working days TAT</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Important Points Regarding Reversal:</strong></p>

<p>In case of a refund, Bookme.pk&rsquo;s helpline will cater to the requirements of the customer. BookMe&rsquo;s call center representative will ask the customer its preferred mode of getting the money back (Bank Account, Mobile Account etc.) The turnaround time is 24 hours for the reversal.</p>

<p><strong>Refund policy</strong><strong>:</strong></p>

<ol>
	<li>Daewoo tickets can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</li>
	<li>Bilal Travel tickets can be cancelled or changed 3 hours before departure and in that case 25% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</li>
	<li>Skyways, Islamabad Express and Niazi Express tickets can be cancelled or changed only 3 hours before departure</li>
	<li>All tickets bought online for Q connect have a penalty of 10% if cancelled 3 hours before the departure time. In case of Q connect only customer can get a refund from bus terminal as well and for that a copy of CNIC is required</li>
	<li>Kainat Travels tickets can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</li>
	<li>Any refund requested by Jazz cash mobile account customer will be posted to respective jazz cash mobile account with in 24 hrs. If the refund request complies with our refund policy</li>
	<li>Cancellation or Adjustment can be done just one time against one order. One time means that one order can be amended or cancelled once only before the departure date of bus</li>
</ol>

<p><strong>&nbsp;Note</strong>:</p>

<p>*Complaint categories may arise from time to time, which will be catered accordingly</p>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

</ul>

	<li>Scenario 1: Free JazzCash Visa Debit Card Offer Handling
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customers shall be eligible for card fee cashback after first shopping/POS purchase transaction</li>
		<li>This offer is valid for customers who order their JazzCash Visa Debit Card online or get it from selected Mobilink Microfinance Bank branch in March 2020, and conduct their first shopping transaction using the card by 31st May 2020</li>
		<li>Customers can get their card on the spot from Mobilink Microfinance Bank branches located in Lahore, Karachi, Islamabad and Multan</li>
		<li>Fee will be credited into customer&rsquo;s mobile wallet within 10 working days of their first shopping transaction from card</li>
		<li>This is a limited time offer and can be withdrawn or changed by JazzCash at any time without prior notice</li>
		<li>The final decision for customer cashback eligibility will rest with JazzCash</li>
		<li>There is no limit on the amount of the first transaction to become eligible for a fee cashback in this campaign</li>
		<li>Only customers who previously had no JazzCash Visa Debit Card issued to them are eligible for this offer upon ordering a card</li>
		<li>Customers who have ordered a new card after their previous card has been lost/stolen of their previous card are not eligible for this offer</li>
		<li>Customers who have the old card and have applied for the newly introduced EMV JazzCash Debit Card are not eligible for this offer</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: VDC Fuel Cashback Campaign-Complaint Handling
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>first confirm if 10 working days have passed from the fuel transaction date o If yes (i.e. 10 working days have passed from the transaction date)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Invite a friend via USSD
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Check CPS if party B is successfully registered or not</li>
		<li>Also check if cashback is received by party A</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Invite a friend via Jazzacsh app
	<ul>
		<li>Check CPS</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

		<li>CNIC Number</li>
		<li>Mobile Number/CLI</li>

		<li>City</li>
		<li>Franchise name</li>
		<li>Transaction reference number</li>
	</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Fraud Execution-Fake Call
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer complains for calls &amp; messages received for fraud attempted and caller asked for MPIN/OTP Code or any other confidential information, which is being shared with the fraudster and fraud, executed.</p>

<p>Customer can register complaint via any of the following channels</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Fraud Complaint USSD (*7039#)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">JazzCash USSD (*786#)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Interactive Voice Response &ndash; 4444</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">4444 helpline (4444 agent)</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>We will first acknowledge customer complaint and guide self-service (USSD &amp; 4444 IVR) for future reference.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Front-End Handling:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">The front-end agent will validate the customer&#39;s concern and perform the following steps:</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Reset the customer&#39;s MPIN</span></strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"> after verifying the required verifications.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Create the following activity in ServiceNow:</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ServiceNow &gt;&gt; Report MMBL Issue &gt;&gt; CC-DFS &gt;&gt; Call Forward to MFS Backend &gt;&gt; Subcategory: Fraud related complaint</span></strong></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Transfer the customer&#39;s call to the <strong>146000</strong> extension (MFS Backend).</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Inform the customer that if the call gets dropped after transferring, the backend team will call back within 30 minutes, and the call will only be made from <strong>0301</strong>.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">TAT:</span></strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"> Live Call Transfer</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Work Code: </span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Call Transferred to Backend - Fraud Related Complaint</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Backend Handling:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If the call is dropped during or before the conversation begins, the backend team will call the customer back within 30 minutes.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Upon receiving the call, the backend agent will validate the customer&rsquo;s concern regarding fraud and take the following actions:</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Proceed with complaint registration in ServiceNow as follows:</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Execution:</span></strong><br />
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ServiceNow &gt;&gt; Report MMBL Issue &gt;&gt; FRM &gt;&gt; Category: Fake Call &gt;&gt; Subcategory: Fraud Execution.</span></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Attempt:</span></strong><br />
<span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ServiceNow &gt;&gt; Report MMBL Issue &gt;&gt; FRM &gt;&gt; Category: Fake Call &gt;&gt; Subcategory: Fraud Attempt.</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">After registering the complaint regarding fraud attempt or execution, the backend agent will close the &#39; Call Forward to MFS Backend &#39; activity after mentioning the fraud complaint ID.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">TAT:</span></strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"> ASAP</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Work Codes:</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Attempt - Complaint Lodged</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Execution - Complaint Lodged</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Attempt - Complaint Not Lodged</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Execution - Complaint Not Lodged</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Not Executed - Call Received</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Executed - MPIN Shared</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Executed - OTP Shared</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Executed - Without Knowledge</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Fraud Executed - Data Leakage</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><strong>As per KMS, it is mentioned that complaint will only be lodged, where customer has shared MPIN/OTP in fraud execution cases;</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>OTP sharing is not the condition, for each case where customer calls for fake transaction that is being executed from his account complaint would be locked in fraud execution tab. While completing the complaint header agent would ask customer the details shared by him with fraudster (OTP is one them) and would input accordingly.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><strong>Please confirm, for cases where fraudster during the call pretends to be the relative or friend of the person to whom he is calling and he already knows the personal details like name, CNIC , residence etc. Will complaint be lodged, where customer transfers amount with his/her consent and no MPIN/OTP is compromised?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>As mention above, yes case would be locked in fraud execution TAB as customer become victim of social engineering.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><strong>Also confirm, where customer has not received any fake call but amount (online payments &amp; merchant payments) has been deducted from JazzCash account and he/she has no idea of that deduction, will complaint be lodged?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>Yes complaint would be locked once customer call helpline to report his grievance about unauthorized deduction from his account either through merchant payments of any other means. In case customer just calls helpline for information prospective no complaint would be locked in that scenario.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>If yes, please confirm what will be added in fraudster MSISDN TAB while registering complaint?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For case where customer did not received any fake call or case where customer is unable to share the number of fraud caller details it would be mentioned as &ldquo;<strong>Nil</strong>&rdquo;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><strong>In case, customer does not has JazzCash account but fraud is executed and amount is sent via retailer channel, will complaint be lodged? If yes, please confirm, which MSISDN is to be used for victim MSISDN?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>Yes complaint would be locked and caller number/ customer number who received call and sender amount via agent would be mentioned as victim.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><strong>Also confirm, from where L3 verifications will be taken for registering complaints, if customer does not have account and amount is sent via retailer channel.</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>In case customer does not have Jazz cash account &amp; is OMNO customer &amp; amount is <strong>sent via agent</strong> complaint would be locked. We believe in that case we could not have L3 verification. Please comment if we have it through any other means.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Is there Any TAT for the complaints registered for fraud attempt/execution?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>No there will be no TAT given by agent.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Is amount reversible transferred in case of fraud?</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>No, there is no reversal.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Need to Check Completed Transaction</li>
	<li>Beneficiary Account</li>
</ul>

<h2>4444 Verification</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Amount</li>
	<li>Fake Caller CLI</li>
	<li>Account number from which fraud is executed</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>It is mandatory to register separate complaint for each fraudulent transaction reported by customer.</li>
	<li>Cases where customer reports that fraudster took the ready cash loan from JazzCash account as well, agent will create the complaint against &ldquo;<strong>Get loan</strong>&rdquo; transaction.</li>
	<li>A complaint containing two or multiple TIDS mentioned in notes will be considered wrong.</li>
	<li>For each transaction, complaint will be registered separately.</li>
	<li>For transaction type, transaction through which fraud is executed, will be selected from drop down menu and where any transaction type is not available in drop down menu, <strong>&ldquo;others&rdquo; </strong>option will be selected.</li>
	<li>Agent will have to mention in notes whatever transaction is executed from JazzCash account.I</li>
	<li>It is important to mentioned in such calls to guide customers, keep the MPIN/OTP secure and do not share with anyone, change and reset the password, new password has to be strong and must not be any date of birth, Vehicle number or any know character.</li>
	<li>No TAT to be given while creating fraud execution/attempt complaints.</li>
	<li>Agent will have to ask customer the questionnaires as mentioned/prescribed by SBP.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;All fraud execution complaints for any transaction (RAAST, C2C, IBFT, ATM withdrawals, load, Bundles, UBPS etc.) executed from JazzCash account will be catered in creator tab.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;There will be no TAT for such complaints and agent will not commit any reversal of the fraudulent amount.</li>
	<li>Agent will only punch fraud attempt/execution workcode as per scenario and cases where MPIN is reset from helpline due to fraud attempt/execution, MPIN related workcode will not be punched as it is the part of process to do so.</li>
	<li>In case of Fraud attempt case where efront request is forwarded from 4444 front end, we should not provide any TAT to the customer also we need to guide the customer that details will be forwarded to relevant department, Please do not say &ldquo;we are forwarding your complaint&rdquo; to the customer</li>
	<li>Sometime customer received call from (+4444, 004444), if customer calls and informs such numbers are making calls, tell them not to respond and not share any confidential information as fraudsters are using such numbers in order to win the trust of customer</li>
	<li>4444 is an inbound short code only (Customers can dial that, we cannot generate outbound calls from 4444)</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong> OR</strong></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>While making Fraud complaint in ServiceNow:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Agent will ask customer is he/she wants to report fraud to FIA. In case customer respond with Yes, agent will select &ldquo;Yes&rdquo; in complaint and also guide the customer to visit nearest MMBL branch to register this fraud by filling physical form.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Service Now &gt;&gt; Report MMBL Issue &gt;&gt; FRM &gt;&gt; Category: Fake Call &gt;&gt; Subcategory: Fraud Execution &gt;&gt;&nbsp;<strong>Report to FIA (Yes)</strong>.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The agent asks the customer: <strong>&quot;Do you want to escalate this case to PTA?&quot;</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer confirms &quot;<strong>Yes</strong>,&quot; the agent will select &ldquo;<strong>Yes</strong>&rdquo; in the complaint and inform the customer that for PTA escalation, they must provide supporting evidence (such as screenshots, transaction details, or any other relevant proof) via our WhatsApp Channel (<strong>0325-4444786</strong>) or Email (<a href="mailto:Complaints@jazzcash.com.pk" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">Complaints@jazzcash.com.pk</a>) within <strong>24 hours</strong>. Failure to do so will result in the complaint being closed for PTA reporting.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>WhatsApp &amp; Email Unit Handling:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Once the customer submits the required details via <strong>WhatsApp</strong> or <strong>Email</strong>.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The respective agent will create the specified ServiceNow complaint, attach the supporting evidence, and mention the previous ServiceNow complaint ID in the required field.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Note: If the customer directly contacts the WhatsApp Channel &amp; Email Unit for a fraud complaint, the WhatsApp channel &amp; Email Unit representative will arrange a callback to address the customer&#39;s concern.</span></span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Extended Verification (if required)</u></strong></span></span></span></li>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong> OR</strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>While locking complaints regarding funds transferred from Payoneer, agent needs to follow below mentioned important check before forwarding the complaint</p>

<ul>
	<li>For all such transactions Complaint Acknowledgememt TAT is 2 working days in which transaction would be credited</li>
	<li>In case it has been two working days and the transaction has still not been credited then the complaint should be locked as per process mentioned above&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Payoneer Account Linking Not Working- Payoneer Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer wants to link Payoneer account with Jazz cash account, but customer is facing error on Payoneer webpage/application or page loading issues.</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Question: <span style="background-color:#dddddd">Auto-Fill issue</span> : While linking their Payoneer Account on the new app , customers sometimes use the autofill option , which has the customer&rsquo;s pre-saved credentials . In such instances the App either crashes or routes the customer to the previous page . </span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><u><strong>Anwser</strong></u><strong>:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Dear user, we are aware that multiple users have been complaining of failure to link the Payoneer account when using their pre-saved credentials. To avoid facing this issue, kindly type your username and password manually on the payoneer sign in screen and click on Sign In button to proceed. We apologize for the inconvenience.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Question: <span style="background-color:#dddddd">OTP issue</span> : The sign in process ends if the customer leaves the app to review the OTP messages separately</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><u><strong>Anwser</strong>:</u> Dear user, due to security reasons, the sign in process ends if you leave the app during the OTP stage of login. In order to successfully sign in to your payoneer account, it is suggested to view your OTP from the notification bar of your phone and enter it manually in the app. If you have put an app lock on your messages, kindly disable the app lock for messages to be able to view the OTP on your notification bar.</span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: PRC Certificate- Payoneer Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">PRC stands for Proceeds Realization Certificate and is used to file tax returns for the freelancers. If you are a freelancer living in Pakistan and withdrawing your Online freelancing income (like from Fiverr, Upwork, Freelancer, Peopleperhour, etc..) through Payoneer or any other method to your bank, you will have to get the PRC (Proceed Realization Certificate issued) to prove the Bank withdrawals as foreign income which will, then, be exempt from tax. As per Income Tax Ordinance of Pakistan, any foreign remittance will be exempt from tax if you have PRC (Proceed Realization Certificate issued) from your bank. Every bank is responsible for issuance of PRC for any foreign remittance. </span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: MPIN Change Request
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Incase customer calls 4444 helpline and ask to reset MPIN we will follow below guidelines.&nbsp;</span></span></span> Experience center, franchise center &amp; retailers guide self-service via USSD or inform customer to call on 4444 helpline for assistance</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123,6140
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Reset MPIN from CPS</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check Available balance</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&lt;Rs 1000, proceed to reset MPIN</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&gt;Rs 1000, proceed to below check</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;No change of SIM/change of ownership during last 48 hours</span></span>
			<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
				<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Proceed with MPIN Change</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</li>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Change of Sim/Change of Ownership during last 48 hours</span></span>
			<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
				<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Ask customer to call after 48 hours</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase available balance in Jazz Cash account is more than Rs.1,000 then check if change of SIM and change of ownership performed during last 48 hours</span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case&nbsp;change of SIM or change of ownership has been performed during last 48 hours then do <span style="color:red">NOT reset the MPIN </span>and guide customer to wait for 48 hours and call again as per existing process </span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We will also educate customer to use USSD self-service menu in future for MPIN reset (sent iSMS as well) at the end of the call</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Do inform every customer at the end of call that MPIN should be kept secret and do not share with anyone</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We will guide customer that temporary MPIN has been pushed via SMS and they will set their new MPIN and incase customer denies receiving MPIN during same call then guide customer to wait for 15 minutes (please do not click MPIN reset button in CPS multiple times during same call)</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:</span></span>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong> OR</strong></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">In case customers all below verification details are not available in CPS we will inform the customer to Visit MMBL bank and get his/her details updated from bank:</span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Mother Name</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">POB not available</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">KYC not updated</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If any information is not available in CPS then agent will consult NADRA portal for verification.</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All other processes, checks and verifications will remain the same</span></span></span></li>

	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Digital Merchant Onboarding Solution
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">State Bank of Pakistan has introduced regulations pertaining to Digital merchant onboarding for <strong>M0</strong> and <strong>M1</strong> Accounts. JazzCash has proactively developed a solution to enable digital onboarding of Merchants, perform their KYC, store KYC data including merchant Pictures/digital images and CNIC images as required by the regulations. </span></span>W<span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="line-height:105%">ith Digital Merchant Onboarding Portal and QR revamp going LIVE, we will effectively enhance our merchant value proposition with a digital solution. </span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Currently OTA is pushed on <strong>selected retailers</strong> aligned for the pilot phase. We will update you once OTA is pushed for <strong>Dermalog device</strong> and <strong>Retail Channel.</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Compliance with State Bank of Pakistan&rsquo;s regulations on digital merchant onboarding</span></span></span></span></li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p>Important Guidelines&nbsp;For Refund Request</p>

<ul>
	<li>Merchant/Customer can call helpline&nbsp;4444 (from Jazz/Warid)&nbsp;</li>
	<li>UAN for OMNO customers&nbsp;051/042/021 111124444&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Customer Reversal :&nbsp;agent will check transaction details (from TID provided by the customer) in CPS and will also take consent from merchant (merchant number can be checked under TID search option) on recorded line for reversal. Before taking request from customer, will guide him/her same that request will only be processed after taking merchant consent.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case, where customer is not willing to wait he/she can directly contact merchant for consent&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once consent is secured from the merchant, agent will route activity to bank, who will than process manual adjustment from merchant to customer&nbsp;</li>
	<li>TAT&nbsp;would be&nbsp;2 working day&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Merchant Reversal&nbsp;: he/she will request on helpline and agent will check details in CPS and route case via activity in e-front to bank (no consent required from customer here as balance will be deducted from merchant account)&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Bank team will process reversal with fee and close the activity&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Child will have to ask his parent merchant for reversal who then will follow aforesaid process&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Careem Voucher Payment Solution Through JazzCash
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">JazzCash customers can now purchase Careem vouchers from JazzCash USSD (Both customer&amp; Retailer). This option is available in customer and Retailer USSD under option 5(Payments <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span>Careem Voucher). These vouchers have fixed denominations (PKR 200, 500, 1000 &amp; 1500). After successful purchase, customer is sent a text message with voucher code. Customer can enter this voucher code in Careem&rsquo;s App and redeem the amount i.e. top up Careem pay wallet.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Payment Channel</u>:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer USSD</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Retailer USSD</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Fee</u>:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Free of Cost for the customers</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Complaint Handling</u>:</strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">As per standard SOP for offline UBP companies. Additional complaint process and mechanics support details are given in respective scenarios</span></span></p>

<p><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Scenarios</span></span></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer amount has been deducted but voucher not received</li>
	<li>Customer Complaints with double deduction</li>
	<li>Voucher is not being redeemed from careem app</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Telenor Bundle & Load Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer is using Jazz cash to purchase Telenor load/Bundle and facing any issue, he/she can call for complaint </span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Can I buy mobile packages for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can purchase mobile packages for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Packages&quot;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To select a mobile package, click &lsquo;Subscribe&rsquo;.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the prepaid number you want to subscribe the mobile package to and click &lsquo;Confirm Number&rsquo;.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Choose the mobile package type (Data or Hybrid).</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select the mobile package you want to subscribe to.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to subscribe the mobile package to.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a mobile package for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can subscribe a mobile package for others. Make sure to select the recipient&rsquo;s mobile operator when choosing a mobile package and enter their number.</p>

<p><strong>How do I know a mobile package has been subscribed?</strong></p>

<p>Whenever you purchase a mobile package, you get a confirmation sms telling you that the mobile package has been purchased. If you buy it for someone else, both you and the recipient get the sms.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Prepaid Load</strong></p>

<p><strong>Can I top up for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can buy load for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Load &amp; Packages&quot; and then &ldquo;Prepaid Load&rdquo;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter mobile number / select recipient from your address book.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator for load.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to buy prepaid load for.</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a prepaid load for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can buy prepaid load for any recipient.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What is the minimum top up amount?</strong></p>

<p>The minimum top up amount varies by operator and is as follows:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Operator</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum Top up Amount</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>49</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ufone</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Telenor</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>70</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Zong</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mentioned in Scenarios</span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Delay In Delivery- Jazz Cash AlaCart
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer call for delay in order delivery complaint</span></span></p>

<h2><u><strong><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Process at Call Center</span></span></strong></u></h2>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer calls at 4444 helpline and complaints about order not received/delayed delivery</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">4444 agent once verified the call is related to complaint ask customer to wait as his/her call will be transferred to complaint department will forward the call via VDN 6262 at Vendor call center along with making (self-completed) complaint in <strong><span style="font-size:13.0pt">efront</span></strong> related to order not received by customer-delay in delivery</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ask MSISDN from which order was placed</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:96px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">OR </span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ask order number from the customer in order to track the order </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">(Whichever was available)</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
