ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Fake Call From Masked CLI Complaint-Jazzcash
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Please follow below guidelines incase call received over helpline from a fake CLI</p>

<ul>
	<li>On receiving calls over 4444 helpline which are being generated through some Web-application/VOIP their appearance on the soft phone/hard phone will be other than normal display. PFB some examples:
	<ul>
		<li>MSISDN starting with 92 e.g. 9203028279780 0r 923028279780</li>
		<li>MSISDN starting with City Code like 02103028279780 or 213028279780</li>
		<li>Any short code</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For any kind of Jazzcash related call, we need to guide customer to call&nbsp;from his/her <u><strong>Own MSISDN on which he owns Jazzcash Account</strong></u>. If customer is on IR and says he/she is calling from abroad, it is suggested to&nbsp;guide customer to email at Jazz customer care with request and scan copy of CNIC front/back&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Users can request payments from anyone sitting in the 44 countries&nbsp;via Jazz cash &amp; world remit&#39;s partnership network. </span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Upon sending a request, a unique request ID will be generated against which the sender sends money into the requestor&#39;s JazzCash mobile account. </span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Once the transfer is authorized, it takes a maximum of 24 hours for it to arrive in the requestor&#39;s JazzCash account.</span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Zong Bundle & Load Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer is using Jazz cash to purchase Zong load/Bundle and facing any issue, he/she can call for complaint </span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Can I buy mobile packages for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can purchase mobile packages for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Packages&quot;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To select a mobile package, click &lsquo;Subscribe&rsquo;.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the prepaid number you want to subscribe the mobile package to and click &lsquo;Confirm Number&rsquo;.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Choose the mobile package type (Data or Hybrid).</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select the mobile package you want to subscribe to.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to subscribe the mobile package to.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a mobile package for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can subscribe a mobile package for others. Make sure to select the recipient&rsquo;s mobile operator when choosing a mobile package and enter their number.</p>

<p><strong>How do I know a mobile package has been subscribed?</strong></p>

<p>Whenever you purchase a mobile package, you get a confirmation sms telling you that the mobile package has been purchased. If you buy it for someone else, both you and the recipient get the sms.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Prepaid Load</strong></p>

<p><strong>Can I top up for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can buy load for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Load &amp; Packages&quot; and then &ldquo;Prepaid Load&rdquo;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter mobile number / select recipient from your address book.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator for load.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to buy prepaid load for.</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a prepaid load for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can buy prepaid load for any recipient.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What is the minimum top up amount?</strong></p>

<p>The minimum top up amount varies by operator and is as follows:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Operator</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum Top up Amount</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>49</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ufone</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Telenor</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>70</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Zong</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As Mentioned in Scenarios</li>
</ul>

	<li><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">Customer MSISDN</span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazzcash NextGen Account Compliant Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Jazz Cash has launched a mobile wallet for customers for the age limit of 12 to 18 years. This account can be created through retailer as well as through an adult&rsquo;s JazzCash App. After creation, minor can use all the Jazz Cash facilities just like any other normal account. Even minor&rsquo;s transaction limits will be the same as that of an L1 account holder, if the guardian&rsquo;s account is an L1</span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <div style="margin-left:24px; text-align:left">
<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What&rsquo;s the commission structure &amp; qualification criteria on Minor Account Opening?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Same as L1 Account</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">How does a minor set Mpin?</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Same as other accounts (USSD or App)</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What are minor Account&rsquo;s transactions limits?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Same as &amp; L1 account limits</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> How many minor accounts can be opened by 1 guardian?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only 2</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: Is it necessary for Guardian to have a JazzCash Account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Yes. System will prompt the guardian to open a JC account If he does not have one already.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> Can one CNIC with multiple mobile numbers have minor accounts tagged with each mobile number?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No. System will check account against guardian&rsquo;s CNIC. Only 2 minor accounts can be there against 1 guardian CNIC.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> What happens when minor turns 18?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Minor gets sms every week that his account will be blocked. To convert to adult, minor visits retailer, to make a biometric verification along with own CNIC details.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: How many times in a month can MSISDNs be changed?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Same as existing limits (twice a month only).</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What details are required to register a NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian CNIC</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian JazzCash Account Number</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Minor CNIC/Form B Number</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Minor CNIC/Form B date of issuance</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian Biometric</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: How many NextGen accounts can I become a Guardian for?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Two</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: My MSISDN is already used to open a NextGen account, can I still open a new JazzCash account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For Minors, only 1 NextGen Account can be opened on 1 MSISDN. A Guardian can have 2 NextGen Accounts registered in his name along with 1 standard JazzCash Account for himself.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What is the age limit to open NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">12 to 17 years</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: How long will it take to register a NextGen account after successful biometric verification of guardian?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Instant</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> If Guardian is not a JazzCash account holder, can he still request to open NextGen account and become guardian of this account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No. Guardian should have a JazzCash Account. Guardian&rsquo;s JazzCash Account can be opened upon registering a NextGen Account</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> What will be the limits of NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Same as an L1 Account</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> Is there any difference of account usage fee of a NextGen account from normal accounts?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What services can be used on NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All except Digital Lending</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> If Guardian has an L0 account, can he request to register a NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian&rsquo;s account will automatically be upgraded to an L1 account when he performs biometric to register a NextGen Account.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> If Guardian account is dormant, can he still request to register a NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian&rsquo;s account will automatically be moved to active from dormant status when he performs biometric to register a NextGen Account.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question: </strong>If Guardian account is blocked/suspended what will happen to the NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">NextGen Account is independent of the guardian&rsquo;s account. No matter what happens to guardian&rsquo;s account NextGen account will keep operating.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question: </strong>What will happen with NextGen account when minor reaches the age of 18?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">NextGen account will be blocked when the minor turns 18. Minor will have to visit retailer to have their account migrated from NextGen to standard JazzCash account</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question</strong>: What is the process to migrate a NextGen account to an adult (standard JazzCash account)?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Minor may visit any JazzCash retailer &amp; provide their CNIC, Mobile number &amp; biometric verification to have their account migrated. The guardian does not have to accompany the minor.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Question:</strong> Can MSISDN be changed of NextGen account?</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Yes. With Guardian&rsquo;s assistance.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>
</div>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Mentioned in Scenarios</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><u><strong><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Scenarios 1,4,6 Checklist:</span></span></strong></u>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Guardian CNIC</span></span></span></li>

		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Minor MSISDN</span></span></span></li>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">

	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Scenario 1: OTP for registration not received by Minor will only be faced by customer when he/she will try to register minor account via retailer </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Scenario 3: Account Migration Minor to Adult will only be processed once the customer have his/her CNIC card available physically </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Scenario 3: Account Migration Minor to Adult will be separated from his/her guardian account once the minor reaches at the age of 18 for this he/she has to register his/her account via BVS</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Minor cannot close his Jazzcash account in case minor wants to close his/her account he/she have to generate a call on 4444 via his guardian CLI</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account closure request of Minor will be taken only from same guardian CLI, other than same CLI request will not be entertained</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All standard offers on a normal account should apply to a Minor Account (NextGen Account)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">Product details is attached in PPT</span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Ufone Bundle & Load Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer is using Jazz cash to purchase Ufone load/Bundle and facing any issue, he/she can call for complaint </span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Can I buy mobile packages for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can purchase mobile packages for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Packages&quot;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To select a mobile package, click &lsquo;Subscribe&rsquo;.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the prepaid number you want to subscribe the mobile package to and click &lsquo;Confirm Number&rsquo;.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Choose the mobile package type (Data or Hybrid).</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select the mobile package you want to subscribe to.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to subscribe the mobile package to.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a mobile package for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can subscribe a mobile package for others. Make sure to select the recipient&rsquo;s mobile operator when choosing a mobile package and enter their number.</p>

<p><strong>How do I know a mobile package has been subscribed?</strong></p>

<p>Whenever you purchase a mobile package, you get a confirmation sms telling you that the mobile package has been purchased. If you buy it for someone else, both you and the recipient get the sms.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Prepaid Load</strong></p>

<p><strong>Can I top up for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can buy load for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Load &amp; Packages&quot; and then &ldquo;Prepaid Load&rdquo;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter mobile number / select recipient from your address book.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator for load.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to buy prepaid load for.</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Can I buy a prepaid load for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can buy prepaid load for any recipient.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>What is the minimum top up amount?</strong></p>

<p>The minimum top up amount varies by operator and is as follows:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Operator</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum Top up Amount</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>49</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ufone</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Telenor</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>70</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Zong</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As mentioned in Scenarios</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Date </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">TID</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Complainant&nbsp; Number</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Amount</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Bundle&nbsp; Name </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Service Provider</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Issue Detail </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer Name </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Beneficiary Number</span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No reversal will be processed in case product has been subscribed twice (amount deducted twice and resources posted twice). This will apply to prepaid load and postpaid bill payment transactions as well. </span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash Sehat Sahulat - Double Deduction on Subscription
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Sehat Sahulat is a Health Insurance facility that covers financial needs to ensure health coverage. Customers purchase insurance plans using their JazzCash Mobile Accounts instantly.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to JazzCash Sehat Sahulat by simply dialing *786*8*3*1# or via JazzCash App</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: omar.ashraf
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrollment and will continue for 1 year</span></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition, are excluded</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><u>Exclusions</u></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Conditions in which a claim is not payable</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pregnancy and related complications</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</span></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">TID</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Date of Subscription</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Type of Plan (annual/monthly)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Plan subscription Platform: USSD, APP, Portal</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer Name</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer CNIC</span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65 years for customer and his or her spouse. Coverage will terminate on 65th birthday</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">To be eligible for coverage, children should be single and economically dependent on parents</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply for hospitalization due to illness. Coverage for accidents will start immediately</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply between consecutive hospitalizations</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h4><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#2e74b5"><em><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Exclusions</span></span></span></em></span></span></span></span></h4>

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Family Tahafuz is a health Insurance facility for customers and their family.</span></span></span></span> The insurance can be purchased through JazzCash Mobile Accounts instantly via paperless enrollment process. </span></span></p>

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Family Tahafuz Premium is a health Insurance facility for customers and their family. The insurance can be purchased through JazzCash Mobile Accounts instantly via paperless enrollment process. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">There is also SMS Doc service, that allows users to avail free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers can SMS their medical query on 5634. A doctor will call back within one business day to discuss the query</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to Family Tahafuz by simply dialling *786*8*3*1# or via JazzCash App</span></span></p>

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">MSISDN</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">TID</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Date of Subscription</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Type of Plan (annual/monthly)</span></span></li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65 years for customer and his or her spouse. Coverage will terminate on 65th birthday</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To be eligible for coverage, children should be single and economically dependent on parents</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply for hospitalization due to illness. Coverage for accidents will start immediately</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply between consecutive hospitalizations</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h4><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#2e74b5"><em><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Exclusions</span></span></span></em></span></span></span></span></h4>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Conditions in which a claim is not payable:</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pregnancy and related complications</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Cosmetic and dental treatment</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Discounted Bundle Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Jazz Cash has started offering <strong>Telenor, Ufone &amp; Zong prepaid GSM bundles at a discount</strong>. They will be launched from time to time as a campaign</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can subscribe to any of the offered discounted bundle for themselves only on the number that the customer has his Jazz Cash account on</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer complaint related to discounted bundles, below mentioned process will be followed:</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Applying Discounted Bundle Process:</span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">When customer applies a discounted bundle, the discounted bundle price will be deducted from his Jazz Cash account and deposited in the Jazz pool account (TID-A). From the Jazz pool account, total bundle amount (incentive amount + discounted bundle price) will be credited to client (Ufone, Zong, Telenor) account (TID-B). The reversal of TID-B is TID-C (total bundle amount reversed from client to Jazz pool). The reversal of TID-A is TID-D (discounted bundle price amount reversed from Jazz pool to customer</span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:573px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>Can I buy mobile packages for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can purchase mobile packages for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Packages&quot;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To select a mobile package, click &lsquo;Subscribe&rsquo;.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the prepaid number you want to subscribe the mobile package to and click &lsquo;Confirm Number&rsquo;.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>How can I purchase a mobile package on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Choose the mobile package type (Data or Hybrid).</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select the mobile package you want to subscribe to.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to subscribe the mobile package to.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>Can I buy a mobile package for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can subscribe a mobile package for others. Make sure to select the recipient&rsquo;s mobile operator when choosing a mobile package and enter their number.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>How do I know a mobile package has been subscribed?</strong></p>

<p>Whenever you purchase a mobile package, you get a confirmation sms telling you that the mobile package has been purchased. If you buy it for someone else, both you and the recipient get the sms.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Prepaid Load</strong></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>Can I top up for only Jazz or other operators also?</strong></p>

<p>You can buy load for all operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor, Zong) via JazzCash.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on the app?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Mobile Load &amp; Packages&quot; and then &ldquo;Prepaid Load&rdquo;</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different operators (Jazz, Ufone, Telenor &amp; Zong). Select your desired operator.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter mobile number / select recipient from your address book.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>How can I buy prepaid top up on USSD *786#?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*3# and select required operator for load.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the number you want to buy prepaid load for.</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter the load amount.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>Can I buy a prepaid load for someone else?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can buy prepaid load for any recipient.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:&nbsp;</span></span></strong></span></span><strong>What is the minimum top up amount?</strong></p>

<p>The minimum top up amount varies by operator and is as follows:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Operator</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum Top up Amount</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80*</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ufone</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Telenor</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>70</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Zong</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>80</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>*For Jazz, the minimum limit for a new user is Rs 50 and goes to Rs 80 once the user has made his first transaction.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black"> If every status is as done then why auto reversal?</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></span></strong> <span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">TID A and B indicate a successful payment for a bundle transaction. TID C is the reversal of TID B + TID D is the reversal of TID A. If both TID C and D status are done (triggered because subscription was not successful on partner end), auto-reversal is successful</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">: In how much time system will Auto reverse the transaction?</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black"> System auto-reversal will be done within 1 minute</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> What should be Reserve Balance Treatment?</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> Reserve balance treatment is the same as for other products</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">: Ideally, in scenario 3, 4-auto reversal should be in place but why we are generating complaint?</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black"> Ideally, auto-reversal will be triggered but we have logged this scenario for manual refund cases.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Question:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black"> How will front end team be having visibility of TID A, B,C,D?</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> Customers will be providing TID A to front-end team. Based on reason type, timestamp, initiator MSISDN, and linked TID, front-end team can isolate the relevant TID B from CPS from the recipient account trx of TID A (i.e. pre-funded pool account). This same process can be applied for finding TID C from TID B + TID D from TID C. </span></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Reason Types:</span></strong></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/png;base64,

	<li>As Mentioned in Scenarios</li>
</ul>

	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">TID Number</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer MSISDN</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Network name of Bundle Subscribed</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Existing network of Customer MSISDN</span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Income Protection Plan - Double Deduction on subscription
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Income Protection plan provides support in terms of monthly Income of PKR 50,000 should the Insured Person die or become permanently disabled due to an accident or unfortunate demise of insured person.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This service can be availed with any other insurance policy in place through paperless enrollment process and with no need for medical examination. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to JazzCash Income Protection Plan by simply dialing *786*8*3*1#</span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Type of Plan (annual/monthly)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Plan subscription Platform: USSD, APP, Portal</span></span></li>

Important Points: <p><strong>Important Points</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year, as per premium payment from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;70 years</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Income Protection Plan offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">This is not a life policy and the premiums will not accumulate. The policy does not have any maturity and the benefit will only be paid if accidental death or accidental disability occurs during the coverage period.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Important Points: <h2><em><strong><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Important Points</span></span></strong></em></h2>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year, as per premium payment from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;70 years</span></span></span></li>

In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This is not a life policy and the premiums will not accumulate. The policy does not have any maturity and the benefit will only be paid if accidental death or accidental disability occurs during the coverage period.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h4><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#2e74b5"><em><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Exclusions</span></span></span></em></span></span></span></span></h4>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Natural Death</span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Income Protection Plan- Reversal
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Income Protection plan provides support in terms of monthly Income of PKR 50,000 should the Insured Person die or become permanently disabled due to an accident or unfortunate demise of insured person.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This service can be availed with any other insurance policy in place through paperless enrollment process and with no need for medical examination. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to JazzCash Income Protection Plan by simply dialing *786*8*3*1#</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: omar.ashraf
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <h2><strong><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Important Points</span></span></strong></h2>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year, as per premium payment from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;70 years</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Income Protection Plan offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This is not a life policy and the premiums will not accumulate. The policy does not have any maturity and the benefit will only be paid if accidental death or accidental disability occurs during the coverage period<span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h4><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#2e74b5"><em><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Exclusions</span></span></span></em></span></span></span></span></h4>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Major Exclusions are:</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Natural Death</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pregnancy or Childbirth</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Suicide</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">War</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Military Service</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mental or Nervous Disorder</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Drug Addiction and Alcoholism</span></span></li>
</ul>

In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;68 years</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Child Protection Plan offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#1f4d78"><span style="font-size:15.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Exclusions</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></h3>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">General Exclusions include but are not limited to:</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Pregnancy or Childbirth</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Suicide</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">War</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Military Service</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Mental or Nervous Disorder</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Drug Addiction and Alcoholism</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Lato&quot;,sans-serif">Natural Death</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Cash Merchant Account Closure-(Migrated Accounts)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS

Complaint Description: <p>Incase merchant want to close his/her account he/she needs to call at helpline 4444</p>

	<li>4 Hours (For Non-Migrated Accounts)</li>

Submission Channel: 34

Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

	<li>As per Scenerios&nbsp;</li>

	<li>Balance Should be Zero</li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <h2><strong><u>Frontend:</u></strong></h2>

<ul>
	<li>4444 agent will not attempt account closure if account balance is available</li>
	<li>In case balance available in the account, agent will request merchant to use/transfer the balance to any of his other account or if balance is less than 1 Rs (which is not transferable) agent will ask the merchant to add some balance in round figures and then transfer complete balance to his other account</li>
	<li>Agent will check if merchant has availed ready Cash service, if yes than will request him to first clear all the dues</li>
	<li>Efront activity will be created for non-migrated contains sub header&agrave;&rdquo;Non-Migrated merchant account closure&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Relevant efront activity needs to be mentioned in CPS by the agent while initiating the task</li>
	<li>Merchnat Account Closure should be performed for all account types&nbsp;M0,M1,M2&nbsp;from helpline&nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong><u>Backend:</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Backend to verify standard notes in efront activity which should be (Same CLI, Zero Balance, L3)</li>
	<li>60 days check on merchant account closure is not applicable</li>
	<li>CPS task initiator &amp; notes mentioned by the agent in efront should be from same agent</li>
	<li>Only Zero balance request will be catered by checkers team</li>
	<li>Merchnat Account Closure task should be approved by backend team for all account types M0,M1,M2</li>
</ul>
