ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Cash RAAST Compliant Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">RAAST is Pakistan&rsquo;s first instant payment system that will enable end-to-end digital payments among individuals, businesses, and government entities within seconds. This would allow for customers to send money via RAAST to other bank accounts through customers mobile numbers by linking their MSISDN with JazzCash. RAAST would allow for transactions where amounts would be sent and received instantly and provide a seamless fund transfer experience for customers using RAAST </span></span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Question- What is RAAST?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer- </strong>RAAST is Pakistan&rsquo;s first instant payment service that enables end-to-end digital payments among individuals, and businesses across the country by providing a better experience to onboard customers by having their RAAST ID created and allowing seamless fund transfer to other bank accounts via mobile numbers through RAAST.</p>

<p><strong>Question- How do I register on RAAST?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong><strong> </strong>Customers can now easily register on RAAST and create their RAAST ID via the JazzCash app or by dialing *786# now.</p>

<p><strong>Question- How can I send funds using RAAST?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> Now you can send funds via RAAST to any bank account to their registered RAAST ID i.e. Mobile number by following these simple steps:</p>

<p><strong>Step 1: </strong>Log into the JazzCash app</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 2: </strong>Select the &ldquo;Send Money&rdquo; option and click on the &ldquo;RAAST&rdquo; Icon <strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 3: </strong>Enter either a RAAST ID or IBAN to send funds to through RAAST</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 4: </strong>Enter the amount of funds to be sent</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 5:</strong> Select the purpose of payment for the fund transfer</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 6: </strong>Enter the recipient&rsquo;s mobile number who would receive an SMS regarding the fund transfer</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 7: </strong>Review your transactional details and select the &ldquo;Confirm&rdquo; option</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 8: </strong>Enter your 4-digit MPIN</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Step 9: </strong>Transfer of funds is successfully completed</p>

<p><strong>Question- How is RAAST different from existing IBFT?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> RAAST is different from IBFT since it is charge free and allows its users to send and receive funds instantly to your account via RAAST.</p>

<p><strong>Question- Are there any charges on RAAST?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> No, there are no charges while performing transactions through RAAST</p>

<p><strong>Question- &nbsp;Can I create more than 1 RAAST ID?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> Multiple RAAST ID&rsquo;s can be created with different accounts however only one RAAST ID can be linked with one bank account</p>

<p><strong>Question- What would be used as a RAAST ID?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> For creating a RAAST ID customers would only need their mobile number that is associated with their bank account</p>

<p><strong>Question- What can be used as a RAAST ID?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> Currently only the customers number can be used for creating their RAAST ID however in the future customers can use their emails, CNIC to create their RAAST ID&rsquo;s as well</p>

<p><strong>Question- How do I delink/ relink my RAAST ID?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> To delink your already linked RAAST ID from your JazzCash account, simply go to the &ldquo;RAAST ID Management&rdquo; tab in my account menu. Customers can then simply click on the de-link you RAAST ID option and proceed with delinking successfully</p>

<p><strong>Question- &nbsp;If you want to change my RAAST ID to a new a/c number, what needs to be done?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> First customers would need to delink their RAAST ID if it already linked to another account or bank. Once that is complete customers can then link their mobile number and create their new RAAST ID linked to their desired bank account</p>

<p><strong>Question- &nbsp;Who are the banks participating on RAAST?</strong></p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong> Majority of all banks including Easypaisa, Standard Chartered, MCB, UBL to name some are all on RAAST</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">If customer has already RAAST ID linked with other bank or MW, shall we be having any access to check it out where it is linked?</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer-</span></strong><span style="color:black"> There would be no portal by way agents can check the status of the linking or delinking of RAAST ID&rsquo;s, incase complaints would be registered those would be routed directly to IT-FS who would share the status of the linking or delinking of the RAAST ID</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">If USSD option to link RAAST ID is, *<strong>786*6</strong>*5, Then what will be the string to update email address? </span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer-</span></strong><span style="color:black"> The string to use the feature of updated email would be *<strong>786*6*9# </strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">If customer has linked RAAST ID, shall we be able to track it out via CPS? &nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer-&nbsp;</span></strong><span style="color:black">No, there is no functionality in CPS as of yet to check linked RAAST ID</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">Shall call center will be given any portal to check the RAAST ID linked or delinked?</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer</span></strong><span style="color:black">- No</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">If account closure request is processed, will RAAST ID be removed or will it remain linked?</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> RAAST ID would be delinked once the customer would close their account. customer can perform delinking of RAAST&nbsp;account fron App or USSD&nbsp;(Both)</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">Will change of MSISDN be executed, if RAAST ID is linked or do we have to delink RAAST ID first to get change of MSISDN done? </span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> Customers should delink their RAAST ID first before change of MSISDN</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">Will RAAST ID be only used for money transfer options?</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> Yes</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Question- </span></strong><span style="color:black">IBAN created via RAAST ID will it be used for international remittances and amount received from Payoneer? IF yes, do we need to guide customers that they do not need to get &ldquo;<strong>Home Remittance</strong>&rdquo; activated for their accounts in order to receive international remittances. </span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:black">Answer:</span></strong><span style="color:black"> No, this will not be supported for Payoneer transactions</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black"><strong>Question</strong>- What are the Limits of RAAST Account</span></span></span></p>

<p><strong><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Answer:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">They are the same as the customer limits currently in place for the L0, L1 and L2 customers respectively PFB limits Table&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/png;base64," style="height:167px; width:1197px" /></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Customer MSISDN</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Customer Name&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Date of Transaction </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Type of transaction&nbsp; </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">RAAST ID (Where required)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">IBAN Number (Where required)</span></span></span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Cash RAAST Compliant Handling-Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>RAAST is Pakistan&rsquo;s first instant payment system that will enable end-to-end digital payments among individuals, businesses, and government entities within seconds. This would allow for customers to send money via RAAST to other bank accounts through customers mobile numbers by linking their MSISDN with JazzCash. RAAST would allow for transactions where amounts would be sent and received instantly and provide a seamless fund transfer experience for customers using RAAST</p>

Submission Channel: 1058
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If customer has already RAAST ID linked with other bank or MW, shall we be having any access to check it out where it is linked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong>&nbsp;There would be no portal by way agents can check the status of the linking or delinking of RAAST ID&rsquo;s, incase complaints would be registered those would be routed directly to IT-FS who would share the status of the linking or delinking of the RAAST ID</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If USSD option to link RAAST ID is, *<strong>786*6</strong>*5, Then what will be the string to update email address?</p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong>&nbsp;The string to use the feature of updated email would be *<strong>786*6*9#</strong></p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If customer has linked RAAST ID, shall we be able to track it out via CPS? &nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Answer-&nbsp;</strong>No, there is no functionality in CPS as of yet to check linked RAAST ID</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Shall call center will be given any portal to check the RAAST ID linked or delinked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer</strong>- No</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If account closure request is processed, will RAAST ID be removed or will it remain linked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;RAAST ID would be delinked once the customer would close their account. customer can perform delinking of RAAST&nbsp;account fron App or USSD&nbsp;(Both)</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Will change of MSISDN be executed, if RAAST ID is linked or do we have to delink RAAST ID first to get change of MSISDN done?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;Customers should delink their RAAST ID first before change of MSISDN</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Will RAAST ID be only used for money transfer options?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;Yes</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>IBAN created via RAAST ID will it be used for international remittances and amount received from Payoneer? IF yes, do we need to guide customers that they do not need to get &ldquo;<strong>Home Remittance</strong>&rdquo; activated for their accounts in order to receive international remittances.</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;No, this will not be supported for Payoneer transactions</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
	<li>Customer Name&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Date of Transaction</li>
	<li>Type of transaction&nbsp;</li>
	<li>RAAST ID (Where required)</li>
	<li>IBAN Number (Where required)</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Family Tahafuz is a health Insurance facility for customers and their family.&nbsp;The insurance can be purchased through JazzCash Mobile Accounts instantly via paperless enrollment process.</p>

<p>There is also SmsDoc service, that allows users to avail free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers can SMS their medical query on 5634. A doctor will call back within one business day to discuss the query</p>

<p>JazzCash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to Family Tahafuz by simply dialling *786*8*3*1# or via JazzCash App</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint

	<li>Plan subscription Platform: USSD, APP, Portal</li>
	<li>Customer Name</li>
	<li>Customer CNIC</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65 years for customer and his or her spouse. Coverage will terminate on 65th birthday</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</li>
	<li>To be eligible for coverage, children should be single and economically dependent on parents</li>
	<li>Waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply for hospitalisation due to illness. Coverage for accidents will start immediately</li>
	<li>A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply between consecutive hospitalisations</li>
</ul>

<p><strong><em>Exclusions:</em></strong></p>

<p>Conditions in which a claim is not payable:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Pregnancy and related complications</li>
	<li>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition</li>
	<li>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</li>
	<li>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</li>
	<li>Cosmetic and dental treatment</li>
</ul>

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Goama Complaint Handling-Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Goama is a gaming platform, which allows apps to host games within their interface. This allows the app user to play a variety of games free and participate in tournaments, to win rewards.</p>

<p>In case customer played any available game/tournament of Game at Jazzcash app and having complaints related to tournament</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Q. Are tournaments free to play?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. There are different tournaments. Some tournaments are free to play while others require an entry fee to be paid through JazzCash mobile account in order for a user to play them.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. How long does the tournament last?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. All tournaments last for a total of 7 days unless specified otherwise. However, the tournament duration left can be viewed for each individual tournament when the user clicks on a specific tournament.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. When am I eligible to play a tournament?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. Every customer is eligible to participate in the tournament if they can view it in their JazzCash app.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. Is there a reward for users who participate in tournaments?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. Users can view the tournament rewards on the tournament screen. Rewards like cash prizes, coupons, vouchers and much more is available for users.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. When will I get the reward if I finish in the rewarding positions?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. Rewards will be given to users within 72 hours of the end of tournament.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. Is it mandatory to play a tournament?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. Playing a tournament is every user&rsquo;s own discretion. In case someone does not want to participate in a tournament, they can play a variety of free games available on the platform</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. How do I get on the leaderboard?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. Users can get on the leaderboard by playing the game throughout the tournament duration. For any game, users can play the game a number of times. User&rsquo;s highest score out of all the attempts would be considered for the leaderboard for that tournament. For example, if a user plays a game three times and has scores of 10,15 and 20 in the game in three attempts, the highest score 20 will be considered their best</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. I did not get the reward despite finishing on the leaderboard. What do I do?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>. In case you have not gotten a reward within 72 hours of the end of tournament, please contact our customer support and provide them with the details including the following:</p>

<ul>
	<li>your name</li>
	<li>your mobile account number</li>
	<li>tournament name</li>
	<li>tournament end date</li>
	<li>tournament fee payment transaction ID</li>
	<li>Your leaderboard position at the end of tournament</li>
</ul>

<p>Our agent will take your details and revert to you in 3 working days with the details about your reward posting. In case reward was not posted, it will be posted. In case, you did not qualify for the reward, you will be informed of the reason for it</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Q. My tournament fee deducted twice for one tournament. What do I do?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A</strong>: In case your tournament fee deducted twice, please contact our customer support and raise your complaint. Also provide details including the following:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Your name</li>
	<li>Your mobile account number</li>
	<li>Tournament name</li>
	<li>Transaction IDs</li>
	<li>Transaction date and time</li>
</ul>

<p>Our agent will check with the relevant team and revert to you within 3 working days. In case of multiple fee payments from your mobile account against a specific tournament, your duplicate transactions will be reversed in to your mobile account.</p>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As mentioned in Scenerios&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Customer Mobile Account Number</li>
	<li>Tournament Name</li>
	<li>Tournament Duration</li>
	<li>Tournament Incentive</li>
	<li>Amount</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <h2><strong>Complaint Acknowledgment Time:</strong></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario-1: Immediate</li>
	<li>Scenario-2: 3 days after tournament end date</li>
</ul>

Category: Both

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazzcash NextGen Account Compliant Handling-Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz Cash has launched a mobile wallet for customers for the age limit of 12 to 18 years. This account can be created through retailer as well as through an adult&rsquo;s JazzCash App. After creation, minor can use all the Jazz Cash facilities just like any other normal account. Even minor&rsquo;s transaction limits will be the same as that of an L1 account holder, if the guardian&rsquo;s account is an L1</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Question</strong>: What&rsquo;s the commission structure &amp; qualification criteria on Minor Account Opening?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Same as L1 Account</li>
	<li>How does a minor set Mpin?</li>
	<li>Same as other accounts (USSD or App)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: What are minor Account&rsquo;s transactions limits?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Same as &amp; L1 account limits</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;How many minor accounts can be opened by 1 guardian?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Only 2</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: Is it necessary for Guardian to have a JazzCash Account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Yes. System will prompt the guardian to open a JC account If he does not have one already.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;Can one CNIC with multiple mobile numbers have minor accounts tagged with each mobile number?</p>

<ul>
	<li>No. System will check account against guardian&rsquo;s CNIC. Only 2 minor accounts can be there against 1 guardian CNIC.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;What happens when minor turns 18?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Minor gets sms every week that his account will be blocked. To convert to adult, minor visits retailer, to make a biometric verification along with own CNIC details.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: How many times in a month can MSISDNs be changed?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Same as existing limits (twice a month only).</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: What details are required to register a NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guardian CNIC</li>
	<li>Guardian JazzCash Account Number</li>
	<li>Minor CNIC/Form B Number</li>
	<li>Minor CNIC/Form B date of issuance</li>
	<li>Guardian Biometric</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: How many NextGen accounts can I become a Guardian for?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Two</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: My MSISDN is already used to open a NextGen account, can I still open a new JazzCash account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Minors, only 1 NextGen Account can be opened on 1 MSISDN. A Guardian can have 2 NextGen Accounts registered in his name along with 1 standard JazzCash Account for himself.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: What is the age limit to open NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>12 to 17 years</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: How long will it take to register a NextGen account after successful biometric verification of guardian?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Instant</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;If Guardian is not a JazzCash account holder, can he still request to open NextGen account and become guardian of this account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>No. Guardian should have a JazzCash Account. Guardian&rsquo;s JazzCash Account can be opened upon registering a NextGen Account</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;What will be the limits of NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Same as an L1 Account</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;Is there any difference of account usage fee of a NextGen account from normal accounts?</p>

<ul>
	<li>No</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: What services can be used on NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>All except Digital Lending</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;If Guardian has an L0 account, can he request to register a NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guardian&rsquo;s account will automatically be upgraded to an L1 account when he performs biometric to register a NextGen Account.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;If Guardian account is dormant, can he still request to register a NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guardian&rsquo;s account will automatically be moved to active from dormant status when he performs biometric to register a NextGen Account.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:&nbsp;</strong>If Guardian account is blocked/suspended what will happen to the NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>NextGen Account is independent of the guardian&rsquo;s account. No matter what happens to guardian&rsquo;s account NextGen account will keep operating.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:&nbsp;</strong>What will happen with NextGen account when minor reaches the age of 18?</p>

<ul>
	<li>NextGen account will be blocked when the minor turns 18. Minor will have to visit retailer to have their account migrated from NextGen to standard JazzCash account</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question</strong>: What is the process to migrate a NextGen account to an adult (standard JazzCash account)?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Minor may visit any JazzCash retailer &amp; provide their CNIC, Mobile number &amp; biometric verification to have their account migrated. The guardian does not have to accompany the minor.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Question:</strong>&nbsp;Can MSISDN be changed of NextGen account?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Yes. With Guardian&rsquo;s assistance.</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Mentioned in Scenarios</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><strong>Scenarios 1,4,6 Checklist:</strong>
	<ul>
		<li>Guardian CNIC</li>
		<li>Guardian MSISDN</li>
		<li>Minor MSISDN</li>
		<li>Minor CNIC</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Scenario 3: Account Migration Minor to Adult Checklist:</strong>

	<ul>
		<li>Minor MSISDN</li>
		<li>Minor CNIC</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: OTP for registration not received by Minor will only be faced by customer when he/she will try to register minor account via retailer</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Account Migration Minor to Adult will only be processed once the customer have his/her CNIC card available physically</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Account Migration Minor to Adult will be separated from his/her guardian account once the minor reaches at the age of 18 for this he/she has to register his/her account via BVS</li>
	<li>Minor cannot close his Jazzcash account in case minor wants to close his/her account he/she have to generate a call on 4444 via his guardian CLI</li>
	<li>Account closure request of Minor will be taken only from same guardian CLI, other than same CLI request will not be entertained</li>
	<li>All standard offers on a normal account should apply to a Minor Account (NextGen Account)</li>
	<li>Product details is attached in PPT</li>
</ul>

<h2><strong>4444 Verification:</strong></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Same CLI of Guardian</li>
	<li>Level-3 Verification: Name, Form-B&nbsp; Number, Mothers Name, Place of Birth</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>OR</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Same CLI of Minor</li>
	<li>Level-3 Verification: Name, Form-B&nbsp; Number, Mothers Name, Place of Birth</li>
</ul>

Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Question:&nbsp;Auto-Fill issue&nbsp;: While linking their Payoneer Account on the new app , customers sometimes use the autofill option , which has the customer&rsquo;s pre-saved credentials . In such instances the App either crashes or routes the customer to the previous page .</strong></p>

<p><strong>Anwser</strong><strong>:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;Dear user, we are aware that multiple users have been complaining of failure to link the Payoneer account when using their pre-saved credentials. To avoid facing this issue, kindly type your username and password manually on the payoneer sign in screen and click on Sign In button to proceed. We apologize for the inconvenience.</p>

<p><strong>Question:&nbsp;OTP issue&nbsp;: The sign in process ends if the customer leaves the app to review the OTP messages separately</strong></p>

<p><strong>Anwser</strong>:&nbsp;Dear user, due to security reasons, the sign in process ends if you leave the app during the OTP stage of login. In order to successfully sign in to your payoneer account, it is suggested to view your OTP from the notification bar of your phone and enter it manually in the app. If you have put an app lock on your messages, kindly disable the app lock for messages to be able to view the OTP on your notification bar.</p>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>

	<li>Customers linking their RAAST ID&rsquo;s with JazzCash would have their QR codes created instantly and can share their QR code whenever they need to</li>
	<li>Dynamic QR transactions would have a validity of 7 days only</li>
	<li>Once a Dynamic QR is created if the customer would want to create another QR code their previous one would be expired</li>
	<li>Amount limits for the Dynamic QR would be the same as per the customers account debt and credit limits
	<ul>
		<li>This change is available on the consumer app only</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

	<li>Minimum amount should be available in account as per plan in order to be eligible for profit</li>
	<li>Minimum account Balance
	<ul>
		<li>Plan A: 2500 Rs</li>
		<li>Plan B: 7500 Rs</li>
		<li>Plan C: 15000 Rs</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenarios</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>In case customer switch his/her plan from low denomination to higher denomination with in same calendar date till 11:59:59 PM in such cases he/she will be eligible for profit as per previous bachat plan
	<ul>
		<li>(For Ex: if a customer activated plan A and switched to Plan B in same date he will be given Plan A profit next day)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></li>
	<li>If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:
	<ul>
		<li>Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>&nbsp;OR</strong>â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹</li>
		<li>Current Account Balance (Nearest balance will also fulfil the requirement)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

	<li>We need to ensure that complaint is after following complete probing required for complaint as per the scenario</li>
	<li>Complaint need to be forwarded by mentioning complete checklist</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Portal not working after 1st&nbsp;Step</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Passcode is not generated or passcode SMS not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: MPIN pop-up not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated</li>
	<li>Scenario 8: Payment Confirmation SMS not received</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>TAT list as per scenario</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding
	<ul>
		<li>12 hours</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow
	<ul>
		<li>12 hours</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Portal not working after 1st Step
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Passcode is not generated or passcode SMS not received
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 5: MPIN pop-up not received
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated
	<ul>
		<li>2 business days</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 8: Payment Confirmation SMS not received
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received
	<ul>
		<li>1 business day</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

	<li>Scenario 1: Card Ordering Page is not responding
	<ul>
		<li>Check any known issue received from helpdesk</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Portal response is very slow
	<ul>
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Portal accessed by CCR</li>
		<li>Time of issue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<ul>

	</ul>

	</ul>
	</li>

	<ul>

		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 6: Connectivity Issue - Payment deducted but order ID not generated (Auto-reversal processed)
	<ul>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Description of issue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 7: Payment deducted but order not placed and no auto reversal generated
	<ul>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Transaction ID</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<ul>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Date &amp; Time</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Scenario 9: Order confirmation SMS/ Email not received
	<ul>
		<li>Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
		<li>Transaction check in CPS</li>
		<li>Order placement check in portal</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Only one card can be ordered at a time</li>
	<li>Delivery time for card is 15 working days</li>
	<li>Confirmation SMS and Email will be send with Order ID</li>
	<li>Once a card order is placed, same customer cannot order another card for next 20 days unless previous request has been rejected or discarded Order Tracking</li>
	<li>Email &amp; SMS with tracking ID will be sent once card will be dispatch</li>
	<li>Customer can check status of the order through portal Returned Order</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Cash RAAST Compliant Handling- Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>RAAST is Pakistan&rsquo;s first instant payment system that will enable end-to-end digital payments among individuals, businesses, and government entities within seconds. This would allow for customers to send money via RAAST to other bank accounts through customers mobile numbers by linking their MSISDN with JazzCash. RAAST would allow for transactions where amounts would be sent and received instantly and provide a seamless fund transfer experience for customers using RAAST</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If customer has already RAAST ID linked with other bank or MW, shall we be having any access to check it out where it is linked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong>&nbsp;There would be no portal by way agents can check the status of the linking or delinking of RAAST ID&rsquo;s, incase complaints would be registered those would be routed directly to IT-FS who would share the status of the linking or delinking of the RAAST ID</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If USSD option to link RAAST ID is, *<strong>786*6</strong>*5, Then what will be the string to update email address?</p>

<p><strong>Answer-</strong>&nbsp;The string to use the feature of updated email would be *<strong>786*6*9#</strong></p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If customer has linked RAAST ID, shall we be able to track it out via CPS? &nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Answer-&nbsp;</strong>No, there is no functionality in CPS as of yet to check linked RAAST ID</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Shall call center will be given any portal to check the RAAST ID linked or delinked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer</strong>- No</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>If account closure request is processed, will RAAST ID be removed or will it remain linked?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;RAAST ID would be delinked once the customer would close their account. customer can perform delinking of RAAST&nbsp;account fron App or USSD&nbsp;(Both)</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Will change of MSISDN be executed, if RAAST ID is linked or do we have to delink RAAST ID first to get change of MSISDN done?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;Customers should delink their RAAST ID first before change of MSISDN</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>Will RAAST ID be only used for money transfer options?</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;Yes</p>

<p><strong>Question-&nbsp;</strong>IBAN created via RAAST ID will it be used for international remittances and amount received from Payoneer? IF yes, do we need to guide customers that they do not need to get &ldquo;<strong>Home Remittance</strong>&rdquo; activated for their accounts in order to receive international remittances.</p>

<p><strong>Answer:</strong>&nbsp;No, this will not be supported for Payoneer transactions</p>

<p><strong>Question</strong>- What are the Limits of RAAST Account</p>

<p><strong>Answer:&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong>They are the same as the customer limits currently in place for the L0, L1 and L2 customers respectively PFB limits Table&nbsp;</p>

<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Customer MSISDN</li>
	<li>Customer Name&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Date of Transaction</li>
	<li>Type of transaction&nbsp;</li>
	<li>RAAST ID (Where required)</li>
	<li>IBAN Number (Where required)</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Outgoing IBFT Block
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>To make secure payments for Jazz Cash customers. Jazzcash&nbsp;implemented restrictions on some Bank accounts and now Jazz Cash customers are unable to make IBFT payments to these bank account.</p>

<p>Customer will receive error prompt on screen and via SMS as well mentioned&nbsp;below:</p>

<p><strong>Error Message:</strong></p>

<p>&quot;Oops! - Outgoing payments to this account has been suspended. Please call the helpline at 4444 or 021-111-124-444 for further information on teh suspension of teh account&quot;</p>

<p><strong>Handling: </strong></p>

<p>Incase customer called and complaint regarding this scenario then agent will verify error and forward below complaint.&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Important Point: </strong></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong>If customer asked the reason why payment to this Bank account is suspended, then agent politely guide customer that to make your payments safe and secure through Jazz Cash we have suspended payment to specified accounts and has implemented some checks, we have forwarded your complaint for the resolution.</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;Complaint handling:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Process at Frontend (4444): </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Cases where customers call over helpline 4444 and complaints that he/she is unable to perform outgoing IBFT due to an error &ldquo;Error MSG&rdquo;</li>
	<li>4444 helpline agents will create &ldquo;Siebel Escalations &ndash; Priority&rdquo; for &ldquo;<strong>IBEX&ndash;LHR &ndash; Escalation Desk&rdquo; </strong>workload and will guide customer a TAT of 2 BD.</li>
	<li>While creating Siebel Escalations &ndash; Priority, 4444 agents will have to mention mandatory notes in activity e.g.</li>
	<li>Customer MSISDN (JazzCash account number i-e calling CLI)</li>
	<li>Receiver&rsquo;s Bank name (where customer is transferring amount)</li>
	<li>Receiver&rsquo;s Bank account number (in which account amount is to be received)</li>
	<li>Error Message Received (error message received while performing outgoing IBFT)</li>
	<li>Amount</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazzcash WebDoc Complaint Handling 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>We are pleased to inform you that JazzCash has launched new health insurance products <strong>Dost Muhafiz </strong>and<strong> Dost Muhafiz Women Health </strong>for our customer in collaboration with WebDoc (Insurance partner). These products are already live for MMBL customers where we are leveraging their agreement for JazzCash customers. Broad product details are as follows:</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><span style="font-size:18px"><strong>Plans:</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>General Health Insurance(Dost Muhafiz) :</strong> is a cashless health insurance where a policy holder is covered against the event of hospitalization</p>

<p>Premium: 1,160/ year</p>

<p>Coverage: Rs. 200,000/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Women Health Insurance(Dost Muhafiz Women health) :</strong> is a cashless women dedicated health insurance where a policy holder is covered against the event of hospitalization. In addition to normal coverages the policy holder is covered against maternity and women specific diseases.</p>

<p>Premium: 2,320/ year</p>

<p>Coverage: Rs. 100,000/</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>These products will currently be offered through outbound call center and USSD only for self-subscription. Following is a high-level process for sales through call center</p>

<ol start="1" style="list-style-type:decimal">
	<li>JC will share lead set with WebDoc</li>
	<li>WebDoc will run a robocall to that lead set. If the customer is interested to opt for the product they&rsquo;ll press 1 or end the call</li>
	<li>Individuals who show interest to opt for the product. The agent will call them explain the product and if they are willing to purchase it the agent will send an MPIN request to them for premium deduction through insurance portal.</li>
	<li>Upon premium deduction customer will receive an SMS for successful subscription and premium deduction.</li>
	<li>Customer will also receive their policy T&amp;Cs through SMS.</li>
</ol>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Other than above 5 complaint handling scenarios if customer query is related to Claim/Policy or not fall in above scenarios then agent will transfer call to WebDoc extension which is 6467</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazzcash App (Consumer/Merchant) Complaint Handling- Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Please be informed that below handling will be followed incase customer complaints regarding JazzCash Application</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Consumer App Login/Account Registration issues:</strong></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>Account registration via jazz cash app will be completed within 24 hours.</li>
	<li>If customer calls and complaints for account registration issue, agent will politely request customer to wait for 24 hours and if it has not completed, case will be raised with the IT-FS team.</li>
	<li>While registering/logging into account via JazzCash app, no complaint will be locked if below mentioned error is received:</li>
</ul>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Oops! Look like you have already linked maximum number of JazzCash accounts on this handset. Please contact us for further assistance. (2 JazzCash accounts can be logged in same device in 30 days).</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Oops! Look like you have already linked your JazzCash account on multiple handsets. Please contact us for further assistance. (Customer can login same account in 2 different devices in 30 days).</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Redirect to device registration -&gt; Guide customer to reinstall App. This issue is only specific to few IOS handset and gets resolved after reinstalling App.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>List of Errors for which complaints will be locked:</strong></p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Login failed</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Locked Keypad, unable to enter OTP (IOS only)</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Oops! This number is already in use for JazzCash merchant account. Please use another mobile number to create a JazzCash customer account.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Registration already in process with other device</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; OTP Fetching issue</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; OTP not received (<a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/Communication/Index/7175">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/Communication/Index/7175</a>)</p>

</ul>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Network availability (data) to be asked from customer/merchant, if there is no network availability (data), no ticket will be created.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check Account Product: <span style="font-size:10.0pt">CPS </span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span></span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"> Search MSISDN </span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span></span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"> Operations </span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span></span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"> Product Tab </span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span></span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"> Product Name</span></span></span></p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Free incentives are not posted on merchant profile, so profile rectification for merchant will be lodged where transactions are not getting processed due to profile issue.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">System check and verification of the customer&rsquo;s concern is mandatory.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">These scenarios will cover the cases, where transactions are not getting processed due to profile or tagged products and where customers are not getting free incentives due to profile issue.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">For all other scenarios, where transactions are not getting processed due to other errors/issues, complaints will be lodged according to their scenarios mentioned in that specific product.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">For corporate profiles and salaried disbursement accounts (having account numbers other normal MSISDNS) request will not be catered from the helpline and will be routed to that specific organization.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">It is mandatory to mention the network name while creating such requests (profile/product rectifications).</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">List of products/profiles that might be tagged with accounts in CPS:</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Food panda profile </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Riders profile</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Cheetay</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">PVTC profile</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Product for expired CNICs</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Outgoing IBFT Blocked</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Sadiq poultry</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

<p><strong>Complaint &ndash; Escalation &ndash; TAT not Lapsed:</strong></p>

<p>For all scenarios where complaint was lodged and complaint TAT is not over. Agent will guide customer to wait for remaining TAT. No complaint will be made.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Work Code: </strong>Term Takaful Complaint - TAT Not Lapsed</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Complaint &ndash; Escalation &ndash; TAT Lapsed:</strong></p>

<p>For all escalation scenarios where complaint was lodged and complaint TAT is over or Complaint is closed but issue is not resolved. Agent will make escalation complaint as per below in e-front. Please refer to Escalation to Back end process. https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/5579</p>

<p>Please use following respective work codes for escalation complaints.</p>

<p>Work Codes: Term Takaful Complaint - TAT Lapsed</p>

<p><strong>Work Code</strong>: Term Takaful Reversal - Activity Closed Issue Not Resolved</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation: </strong></p>

<p>Check Account Status: CPS -&gt;&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp;Search MSISDN &agrave; Check Status</p>

<p>Check Transaction History: CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN -&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click Operations -&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click Review Transaction&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1 Merchant Sell Load &ndash; Load not posted</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Sell Jazz Load Transaction Completed - Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Merchant Sell Load &ndash; Sell Load transaction Authorized &ndash; Settlement Required</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Sell Jazz Load Transaction Reserved - Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>System Navigation</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &agrave; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &agrave; Click History Tab &agrave; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &agrave; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &agrave; Click History Tab &agrave; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

<p><strong>Check Tagged Product value via Product tab:</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Select Info &agrave; select Product Tab &agrave; View Product Name &agrave; Check Product value</p>

<p><strong>Check Tagged Product value via Other Account Details:</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Select Info &agrave; Select KYC Info Tab &agrave; View Know More Info &agrave; Check Other Account Details</p>

<p><strong>Check CNIC Expiry Date</strong>: CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Select Info &agrave; Select KYC Tab &agrave; View ID Details &agrave; Check ID Expiry Date</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer Details in CPS using CNIC</strong>: CPS &agrave; Click Search &agrave; Select Customer &agrave; Select ID in Query Condition option &agrave; Enter CNIC in ID field</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer Details in NADRA using CNIC</strong>: NADRA Portal &agrave; Search using CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date &agrave; Check Customer Details</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer MSISDN Status in CSRTB:</strong> Select Consumer Tab &agrave; Search MSISDN in Consumer Tab &agrave; Check Customer Details</p>

<p><strong>Scenario 1.2 KYC Updation Required:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If any customer KYC is missing then what is the process to be followed.</li>
	<li>If all above KYC details are missing then what is process to be followed.</li>
	<li>If customer mother name is incorrect and in our system in NADRA and CPS details are same what is the process to be followed for resolving customer issue</li>

			</td>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Minimum loan Amount</p>

			</td>
		</tr>

<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>System Navigation:</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction&gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>To Check Loan Amount via Ready Cash Portal:</strong> KMS Quick <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Links <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Ready Cash Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Pending Amount</p>

<p><strong>To Check Loan Amount via In &ndash; House Lending Portal:</strong> KMS Quick <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Links <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> in-house Lending Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Pending Amount</p>

Complaint Description: <p>&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Merchant Unikrew.<br />

			<p>App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>System Navigation:</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk146125556"><strong>Check Card Status in Visa Debit Card Portal: </strong>Visa Debit card portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</a></p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click MasterCard Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN With (92)</p>

<p><strong>Check Link Card in CPS: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt; </strong>Click Linked Cards &gt;&gt; Check Linked Card</p>

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136358544"><strong>Visa Debit Card Complaint &ndash; Scenarios</strong></a></p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Visa Debit Card &ndash; Card Stuck in Atm</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card Captured - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.3: Visa Debit Card &ndash; POS Transaction &ndash; Amount Not Received &nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>45 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>

			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint - Activity Closed but Issue Not Resolved</p>
			</td>

			<p>15 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification detail</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk146125556"><strong>Check Card Status in Visa Debit Card Portal: </strong>Visa Debit card portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</a></p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

<p><strong>Check Link Card in CPS: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt; </strong>Click Linked Cards &gt;&gt; Check Linked Card</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Money Transfer â€“ IBFT â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with money transfer IBFT.</p>

<ul>
	<li>There are two types of IBFT Transaction</li>
	<li>Incoming IBFT Transaction</li>
	<li>Outgoing IBFT Transaction</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;If customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform customer to register complaint at Sender Bank.</p>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For outgoing IBFT where amount is not received in beneficiary account (Refer to Complaint Scenarios).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process is only applicable if transaction is in complete state.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For all cases where complaint is still in pending state and complaint TAT is over <a name="_Hlk139326304">follow Escalation To Backend process.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to view complaint status</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

Submission Channel: 34

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Payment Gateway
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This process is covering the complaint handling scenarios related to Payment Gateway payments.</li>
	<li>Payment Gateway is a solution that allows customers to buy third-party items or subscriptions online using their JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>Customers can make payments through JazzCash App for various services such as voucher payments for Daraz, Foodpanda, Careem, Golootlo, and more.</li>
	<li>To make a payment, the customer generates a voucher from a third-party website/app or the JazzCash App and pays for it using their JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>This process is applicable only if the transaction is in a completed or authorized state.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

			<p>In case of death due to suicide or self-inflicted Injury.</p>

			<p>Any pre-existing conditions contracted due to accident or bodily Injury before the commencement of cover under this policy.</p>

			<p>Murder, Suicide, self-inflicted Injury, participation in a criminal act, or violation of the law.</p>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Term Takaful Insurance Transaction: Completed</li>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:98%">

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Payoneer 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This process is covering the complaints handling scenarios related to funds transfer from Payoneer to JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>Payoneer is a platform that enables businesses and professionals to make international payments and connect across different countries and currencies.</li>
	<li>Freelancers often use Payoneer to receive their payments for their work.</li>
	<li>Freelancers who have a JazzCash account can link it with their Payoneer account.</li>
	<li>This linking allows them to transfer funds from their Payoneer account to their JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>For all other transaction status, please refer to Payoneer SOP document.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Payoneer Transaction</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA,</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			<p>Customer having JazzCash &amp; Payoneer Account Linked</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation (as per scenarios)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum amount = 5 Currency Units (USD-Dollar, GB -Pound &amp; Euro)</p>

			<p>Daily withdrawal Limit = 10 transactions or 150,000 in total for every 24 Hours</p>

			<p>Monthly withdrawal Limit = 30 transactions or 500,000 in total for every 30 days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
	<li>Payoneer &amp; JazzCash Account Linked: Yes</li>
	<li>Amount =&gt; 5 currency units</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:100%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Payoneer Complaint &ndash; Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1 Payoneer &ndash; Unable to Link/Delink Payoneer Account</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint &ndash; Account Linking Issue</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint - Amount Not Getting Deducted</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.4: Payoneer &ndash; Funds Transfer &ndash; Payoneer Balance not Visible</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint - Balance Not Showing</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.5: Payoneer &ndash; Funds Transfer &ndash; Exchange Rate Not Working</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint - Dollar Conversion Not Working</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.6: Payoneer &ndash; Funds Transfer - Payoneer Account Debited &ndash; Funds Not Received in JazzCash</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint - Amount Deducted And Funds Not Received - Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.7: Payoneer &ndash; PRC Generation Request</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Payoneer Complaint - PRC Generation</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>7 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Mahfooz Mustakbil Plan
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Mahfooz Mustakbil Plan.</li>
	<li>Mahfooz Mustakbil Plan insurance is aimed at safeguarding children future by providing Rs. 400,000 for just Rs. 549 per year to help fund his/her education expenses should the Policy holder die or become permanently disabled due to an Accident.</li>
	<li>Jazz Cash Mobile Account customers can subscribe to Jazz Cash Mahfooz Mustakbil Plan by simply dialing [*786*8*3*1*2#] from their Jazz mobile</li>
	<li>For all cases where complaint is still in pending state and complaint TAT is over follow Escalation to Backend process.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>

			<p>Look Free Period</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>14 days (Starts from the day of subscription)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Elimination Period</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>14 days (Starts from the day of subscription)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Enrolment Age: 18 &ndash; 70 years Coverage Terminates when a participant attains 70 Birthday</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation/Exclusion from Policy</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Mahfooz Mustakbil Plan offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</p>

			<p>General Exclusions include but are not limited to:</p>

			<p>Pregnancy or Childbirth</p>

			<p>Suicide</p>

			<p>War</p>

			<p>Military Service</p>

			<p>Mental or Nervous Disorder</p>

			<p>Drug Addiction and Alcoholism</p>

			<p>Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</p>

			<p>Natural Death</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Consultation Portal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Mahfooz Mustakbil plan Transaction: Completed</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
</ul>
