In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</p>

			<p>This is not a life policy and the premiums will not accumulate. The policy does not have any maturity and the benefit will only be paid if accidental death or accidental disability occurs during the coverage period. Major Exclusions are</p>

			<p>Natural Death</p>

			<p>Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</p>

			<p>Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>

			<p>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison Cosmetic and dental treatment</p>
			</td>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1 Careem Voucher Complaint &ndash; Double Deduction</p>

	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 15968

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Escalation Handling â€“ Escalation to Backend 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Escalation handling is the process of prioritizing customer support issues, evaluating problems based on severity, and making sure the appropriate representatives are assigned to handle them. Managing escalations is a key part of keeping more customers and ensuring FCR.</li>
	<li>For JazzCash Contact Center, escalations are done for both Service requests (SR) &amp; complaints.</li>
	<li>Escalation of a Service request or Complaint is made if customer&rsquo;s request/complaint is already registered but not resolved.</li>
	<li>Below are the reasons for which this Escalation Handling SOP will be followed.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:642px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Escalation reason</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Registered SR/Complaint is in Pending state. TAT is Over</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer inquire about the status of the already registered service request or complaint. Service request/complaint is in pending state and respective Turn Around Time (TAT) for resolution is over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Registered SR/Complaint is in closed state. Issue Not resolved as per customer</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer inquire about the status of the service request or complaint. Although the service request/complaint has been marked as closed, customer insists that the issue has not been resolved to their satisfaction.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios </strong></p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:623px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Scenario 1. Escalation handling Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Registered SR/Complaint Status Pending - TAT is Over</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>As per original complaint escalation TAT Over work codes</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Registered SR/Complaint Status Closed &ndash; Issue Not resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>As per original complaint escalation TAT Over work codes</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Please be informed that for customer queries related to status of an already registered complaint of DFS &amp; re-opening of the disputed case, only below verification is required.
	<ul>
		<li>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Same CLI</li>
		<li>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Same Customer</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Moreover, agent will have to validate already registered complaint before guiding remaining TAT or escalating it in-case of re-opening of the concern.</li>
	<li>If complaint/request is registered in wrong header or have wrong values added in LOVs, agent will have to create new complaint/request.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

Submission Channel: 3073,34

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ E-Voucher 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/JazzCash/Index/133</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process is covering the complaint handling scenarios related to E-Voucher Payment</li>
	<li>This is to update that JazzCash has introduced new feature to facilitate and empower our customer for online payments through E-voucher.</li>
	<li>E-voucher is a payment mode in JazzCash, customers will not need credit card for online purchases/payments for companies available in the E-voucher tab on JazzCash App.</li>
	<li>They will purchase the voucher and use the voucher code on the company&#39;s checkout page after purchasing the product.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

	<li>Payment Gateway Transaction status: Authorized/ Completed</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p>Check Account Status: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p>Check Transaction History: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p>Check Transaction Status: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click History Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation (as per scenarios)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>

			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Consultation Portal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Cash Withdrawal via ATM Transaction status: Completed</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:98%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Cash Withdrawal Complaint &ndash; Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>TAT</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Cash Withdrawal Via ATM &ndash; Withdrawal Amount Deducted But Not Received</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>PayPak Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Master Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Visa Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>7 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Cash Withdrawal Via ATM &ndash; Withdrawal Amount Reversed But Charges Not Reversed</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>PayPak Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Master Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Visa Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>7 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.3: Cash Withdrawal Via ATM &ndash; Amount Not Reversed &ndash; Disputed Cases</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>PayPak Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Activity Closed But Issue Not Resolved</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>&nbsp;Master Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Activity Closed But Issue Not Resolved</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Visa Debit Card - Cash Withdrawal Dispute - Activity Closed But Issue Not Resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>15 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Money Transfer â€“ IBFT 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with money transfer IBFT.</li>
	<li>There are two types of IBFT Transaction
	<ul>
		<li>Incoming IBFT Transaction</li>
		<li>Outgoing IBFT Transaction</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform customer to register complaint at Sender Bank.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For outgoing IBFT where amount is not received in beneficiary account (Refer to Complaint Scenarios).</li>
	<li>This process is only applicable if transaction is in complete state.</li>
	<li>For all cases where complaint is still in pending state and complaint TAT is over follow Escalation To Backend process.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Merchant IBFT Transaction</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

Submission Channel: 3073,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: ruqqia.bibi1

Verification Status: 6150
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal:</strong> CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 16047

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“Merchant - Escalation Handling â€“ Escalation to Backend 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Escalation handling is the process of prioritizing merchant support issues, evaluating problems based on severity, and making sure the appropriate representatives are assigned to handle them. Managing escalations is a key part of keeping more merchant and ensuring FCR.</li>
	<li>For JazzCash Contact Center, escalations are done for both Service requests (SR) &amp; complaints.</li>
	<li>Escalation of a Service request or Complaint is made if merchant request/complaint is already registered but not resolved.</li>
	<li>Below are the reasons for which this Escalation Handling SOP will be followed</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:642px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Escalation reason</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Registered SR/Complaint is in Pending state. TAT is Over</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant inquire about the status of the already registered service request or complaint. Service request/complaint is in pending state and respective Turn Around Time (TAT) for resolution is over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Registered SR/Complaint is in closed state. Issue Not resolved as per merchant</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant inquire about the status of the service request or complaint. Although the service request/complaint has been marked as closed, merchant insists that the issue has not been resolved to their satisfaction.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios </strong></p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:623px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Scenario 1. Escalation handling Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Registered SR/Complaint Status Pending - TAT is Over</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>As per original complaint escalation TAT Over work codes</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Registered SR/Complaint Status Closed &ndash; Issue Not resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>As per original complaint escalation TAT Over work codes</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Please be informed that for merchant queries related to status of an already registered complaint of DFS &amp; re-opening of the disputed case, only below verification is required.
	<ul>
		<li>Same CLI</li>
		<li>Same Merchant</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Moreover, agent will have to validate already registered complaint before guiding remaining TAT or escalating it in-case of re-opening of the concern.</li>
	<li>If complaint/request is registered in wrong header or have wrong values added in LOVs, agent will have to create new complaint/request.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

Submission Channel: 3073,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: ruqqia.bibi1
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6150
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam

SOP Status: Active

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

<p><strong>Check Link Card in CPS: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt; </strong>Click Linked Cards &gt;&gt; Check Linked Card</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card Captured - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>7 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Visa Debit Card &ndash; POS Transaction &ndash; Unable to Perform POS Transaction</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.3: Visa Debit Card &ndash; POS Transaction &ndash; Amount Not Received &nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>45 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.4: Visa Debit Card &ndash; POS Transaction &ndash; Disputed Case</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card - Pos Transaction Complaint - Activity Closed but Issue Not Resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>15 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.5: Visa Debit Card &ndash; Technical Issue &ndash; Unable to Use Card</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Visa Debit Card Technical Issue Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification detail</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in Visa Debit Card Portal: </strong>Visa Debit card portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

<p><strong>Check Link Card in CPS: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt; </strong>Click Linked Cards &gt;&gt; Check Linked Card</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Jazz Bundle 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Jazz/Warid Bundle.</li>
	<li>Incase customer buys a Bundle and load is posted on customer MSISDN instead of bundle and load is used. agent will forward below activity and inform customer that used load amount will be posted against party B MSISDN.</li>
	<li>Incase customer buys a bundle and no bundle/load is posted then agent will forward below activity and will inform customer that load will be posted on beneficiary MSISDN.</li>
	<li>Incase customer buys a Bundle and load is posted and load is available then agent will inform customer to activate bundle with that load amount manually.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details:</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jazz Bundle Transaction</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Bundle Subscription Status in CSRTB: </strong>CSRTB &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN In Contract &gt;&gt; Click Contract ID Click Get Consumption</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.14: MasterCard Debit Card &ndash; Technical Issue &ndash; Unable to Use card</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Master Debit Card Technical Issue Complaint Lodged</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in Visa Debit Card Portal: </strong>Visa Debit card portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Jazz Bundle 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Jazz Bundle.</li>
	<li>Incase merchant perform Bundle instead of bundle load is posted on merchant MSISDN and load is used agent will forward below activity and inform merchant that used load amount will be posted again on MSISDN.</li>
	<li>Incase merchant perform bundle and no bundle/load is posted then agent will forward below activity and will inform merchant that load will be posted on beneficiary MSISDN.</li>
	<li>Incase merchant perform Bundle instead of bundle load is posted and load is available then agent will inform merchant to activate bundle with that load amount manually</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details:</li>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

<p><strong>Android User</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For OTP fetch, sim need to be in slot 1 and in same device</li>
	<li>All JazzCash App permissions need to be allowed</li>
	<li>Device Need to be PTA Approved</li>
	<li>App need to be Updated</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>IOS Users</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</li>
	<li>IPhone does not auto-fetch OTP while logging into JazzCash app.</li>
	<li>Users will have to enter the OTP within 10 seconds</li>
	<li>App needs to be updated to the latest version</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:94%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Complaint &ndash; Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>TAT</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: JazzCash App Complaint &ndash; Unable to Login JazzCash App &nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer App Login Issue - Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
	<li>JazzCash account level should be level 1 or 2</li>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Review Transaction &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification detail</p>

<p><strong>Check Paid Invoices in CSRTB</strong>: CSRTB &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN In Consumer Tab &gt;&gt; Click Paid Invoices &gt;&gt; Check Invoices</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.4: Bachat Account Complaint &ndash; Plan Subscribed &ndash; Less Profit Posted</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz Cash Bachat Account Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.5: Bachat Account Complaint &ndash; Unable to Unsubscribe Bachat Plan</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz Cash Bachat Account Complaint Lodged</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where customer is unable to create JazzCash account via USSD and error occurs that <strong>CNIC is Blacklisted</strong> validate account existence in CPS and inform customer to visit MMBL&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Scenario 1.1: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Transaction Complete &ndash; But not Credited &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - Funds Deducted but Not Received</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Transaction Complete &ndash; But not Credited - All</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - Funds Deducted but Not Received</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.3: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Transaction Completed &ndash; Wrong Amount Deducted</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - Wrong Amount Deducted</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.4: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Transaction Complete &ndash; Debit Card Not Saved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - Card Not Saved</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.5: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Unable to Delete Card</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - Card Not Saved</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.6: Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; Unable to Perform Transaction &ndash; OTP not Received from Sender Bank</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Deposit Money Via Debit Card Complaint - OTP Not Received from Issuer Bank</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2 Working Day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>System Navigation:</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Deposit Via Debit Card â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Deposit via debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash merchant can deposit amount directly in their JazzCash Business account via Debit Card of any Bank.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Before locking agent must ensure merchant is following correct process</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For complaint registration agent will ask specific error and will mention complete error and issue in complaint remarks</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details:</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Deposit via Debit Card Transaction</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0, M1, M2</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication &gt;&gt; USSD Platform fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication &gt;&gt; App Platform fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3% + FED of Deposit Amount</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Minimum Deposit Amount per Transaction</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>100 Rs.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Maximum Deposit Amount per Transaction</p>
			</td>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk137723218">Consultation Portal</a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, NADRA, Konnect</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong>Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS and NADRA only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OTP Checklist for Android and IOS user</p>

<p><strong>Android User</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OTP fetch for sim need to be in slot 1 and in same device</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All JazzCash Business App permission need to be allowed</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Device Need to be PTA Approved</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App need to be Updated</p>

<p><strong>IOS Users</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IPhone does not auto-fetch OTP while logging into JazzCash app.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Users will have to enter the OTP within 20 seconds</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App needs to be updated to the latest version</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details:</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204908"><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:94%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136358544"><strong>Complaint &ndash; Scenarios</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>System Navigation:</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Review Transaction &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with merchant USSD (*800#) .</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where customer is unable to create JazzCash account via USSD and error occurs that <strong>CNIC is Blacklisted</strong> validate account existence in CPS and inform customer to visit MMBL&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS and NADRA only</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>System Navigation:</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt;Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Tagged Product value via Other Account Details</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Select Info &gt;&gt; Select KYC Info Tab &gt;&gt; View Know More Info &gt;&gt; Check Other Account Details</p>

<p><strong>Check CNIC Expiry Date</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Select Info &gt;&gt; Select KYC Tab &gt;&gt; View ID Details &gt;&gt; Check ID Expiry Date</p>

<p><strong>Check Merchant Details in CPS using CNIC</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Click Search &gt;&gt; Select Merchant &gt;&gt; Select ID in Query Condition option &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC in ID field</p>

<p><strong>Check Merchant Details in NADRA using CNIC</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search using CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date &gt;&gt; Check Merchant Details</p>

<p><strong>Check Merchant MSISDN Status in CSRTB:</strong> Select Consumer Tab &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Consumer Tab &gt;&gt; Check Merchant Details</p>

			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS and Nadra only</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204908"><strong>Complaint Scenarios</strong></a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:84%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136358544"><strong>JazzCash Incentive Complaint Management &ndash; Scenarios</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>TAT</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: JazzCash Incentive &ndash; Balance Maintenance Incentive<strong> </strong>&ndash; Minutes not Posted</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Incentive Related Complaint - Balance Campaign</p>
			</td>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Same day 12 AM (if Complaint processed in Super office before 11:PM)</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Next day 12 AM (if Complaint processed in Super office after 11:PM)</p>
			</td>

			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</strong> NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong>Check Complaint Status: </strong>Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong>Check Complaint remarks</strong>: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks </a></p>

<p><strong>Check Incentive in CSRTB</strong>: CSRTB &gt;&gt; Click Contract &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Get Consumption</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Money Transfer â€“ IBFT â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with money transfer IBFT.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two types of IBFT Transaction</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Incoming IBFT Transaction</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outgoing IBFT Transaction</p>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform customer the initial 24 hours TAT if not received in respective TAT inform customer to register complaint at sender bank.</p>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT Transaction</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For outgoing IBFT where amount is not received in beneficiary account agent will follow the below complaint handling scenarios.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process is only applicable if transaction is in complete state.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where transaction is completed agent will ask the customer to wait for 24 hours.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will guide the customer to keep on checking the beneficiary account statement and initiator account as well.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For all cases where complaint is still in pending state and complaint TAT is over <a name="_Hlk139326304">follow Escalation to Backend process.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

			<p>15 Working Days</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Organization Operator &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Utility Bill Payment â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Customer Utility Bill Payment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Before initiating complaint, agent must ensure that customer know complete product detail.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For registering complaint PTCL &amp; KESC TAT is 4 working days. For other companies, its 1 working day.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint Status:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</p>

<p><strong>Check Complaint remarks:</strong> Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Tagged Product value via Product tab:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> select Product Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> View Product Name <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Product value</p>

<p><strong>Check Tagged Product value via Other Account Details:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select KYC Info Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> View Know More Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Other Account Details</p>

<p><strong>Check CNIC Expiry Date</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select KYC Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> View ID Details <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check ID Expiry Date</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer Details in CPS using CNIC</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select Customer <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Select ID in Query Condition option &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC in ID field</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer Details in NADRA using CNIC</strong>: NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search using CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from Customer)<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Customer Details</p>

<p><strong>Check Customer MSISDN Status in CSRTB:</strong> Select Consumer Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN in Consumer Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Customer Details</p>

			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</li>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in Visa Debit Card Portal: </strong>Visa Debit card portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Card Status in CTI Portal: </strong>CTI &gt;&gt; Click Master Card &gt;&gt; Click CLI Validation &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with (92)</p>

<p><strong>Check Link Card in CPS: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt; </strong>Click Linked Cards &gt;&gt; Check Linked Card</p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17558

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Money Transfer to MMBL â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Money Transfer to MMBL.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Before initiating complaint, agent must ensure that customer know complete product detail.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer is facing error &ldquo;<strong>Oops something went wrong&rdquo;</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If above error occurs &ldquo;Agent will inform customer that use Account number instead of IBAN for transfer fund, if error occurs &ldquo;<strong>Session Timeout</strong>&rdquo;. Inform customer to try again and perform transaction with entering account number&rdquo;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction&gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>:&nbsp;NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: OMNO Bundles Initiated through SIMOSA APP - RU Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This document will cover scenarios related to OMNO bundle and postpaid bill</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can now purchase the OMNO bundle through the SIMOSA app using the Jazzcash gateway.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customers faces any issues while purchasing the bundle or paying their bill through the SIMOSA app, they are advised to coordinate with Jazz helpline for assistance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Complaints regarding scenarios where customers have purchased a bundle or paid their bill but claim that the bundle is not activated or the post-paid bill amount remains unpaid will be directed to the RU workload from Jazz&#39;s side.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>OMNO Bundles Initiated through SIMOSA APP - RU Handling:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">The request will be made from Jazz side in super office and routed to Jazzcash completer RU team and RU team will create the complaint in service now and share notes in super office case for Jazz frontend after complaint closure in service now.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Note: </span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">If all necessary complaint details are in Super Office, RU agents will submit the complaint directly in ServiceNow. Otherwise, RU agent will call-back the customer for missing information and then lodge the complaint in ServiceNow, following the process below.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">TAT for taking the request from Super office case to Service now: 4 hours</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">TAT for transferring feedback from ServiceNow to Super Office: 4 hours</span></span></span></span></p>

			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:41px; vertical-align:top; width:19%">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">2 Working Day</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Payment Via Mobile NFC (Tap Pay) </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap and Pay via NFC allows customers to make payments using their mobile phones</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">There are three pre-requisites to avail these services</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device must Android NFC enabled </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device Lock must be set</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Popup feature must be enabled</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Where customer is unable to setup Tap Pay agent will confirm above checklist before locking complaint (Refer to scenario 1.1).</span></span></li>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17660

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Tap on Phone â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Tap on Phone</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">This product feature involves the incorporation of a card payment acceptance function that will allow merchants to process payments from all major card networks &ndash; For now its going to be VISA and Mastercard.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform customer to register complaint at Sender Bank</span></span></span> &nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The pre-requisite to avail service.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device must be Android NFC enabled </span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17664

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer - BISP - Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to BISP payment.</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">The Benazir Income Support Program is a federal unconditional cash transfer poverty reduction program in Pakistan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">The goal of BISP is to Enhance financial capacity of poor people and their dependent family members.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>If complaint regarding BISP lands on the 4444 helpline, the agent needs to transfer the call to extension (146004).</strong></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Eligible families receive cash payments of 10,500 quarterly.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">Limited Mandate Account (LMA-current account) for each BISP beneficiary for disbursement of cash assistance issued by BISP.</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">BISP beneficiary shall have only one option at the BVS enabled touch points i.e. to withdraw the funds from LMA.</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">Withdrawals from LMA shall be allowed through BVS enabled touch points via Original Valid CNIC and biometric verification through NADRA on real time basis.</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">In case beneficiary calls at helpline and complaints about BISP complaint. BISP agent need to handle as per below scenarios<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>
