<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction&gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check BNPL Loan status: </strong>LMS &gt;&gt;<strong> </strong>Call center View &gt;&gt; Set start &amp; end date &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN with 92 or can check with CNIC number &gt;&gt; Click on View tab to check loan details </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ EFU Term Life Plus Plan â€“ Complaint Management

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with EFU Term Life Plus Plan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can subscribe EFU Term Life Plus Plan by outbound call, JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Previously EFU Term Life Plus Plan was known as Term Takaful Insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk177726211">For insurance subscriptions from September 2nd onwards, no reversals will be processed for any plan, including Annual, Monthly, and Daily.</a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a customer complains about mis-selling, the agent will inform the customer that by providing digital consent, you have subscribed to the insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer still insists that incorrect information was provided by the insurance representative, the agent will ask for the specific information or benefits shared with the customer. After validating the concern, if the issue is found valid, the agent will lodge a complaint and document the complete issue of mis-selling details in the complaint remarks.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></li>
</ul>

			</td>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">EFU Term Life Plus Plan Complaint - Unable to Subscribe/Unsubscribe</span></span></span></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top; width:85px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">1 Working days</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>:&nbsp;NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">To check Cooldown Status</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Customer Info &gt;&gt; Check State Tag tab after the basic info tab</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk149234157"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">To Check Transaction status</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">:</span></span><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</span></span></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">To Check Failure Description</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">:</span></span><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>:<br />
	NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></li>
</ul>

			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:53px; vertical-align:top; width:35%">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Scenario 1.3: ONIC Bundle &ndash; Transaction Authorized - Settlement Required</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:53px; vertical-align:top; width:45%">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Onic Bundle - Reserved State - Complaint Lodged</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:53px; vertical-align:top; width:19%">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">3 Working Days</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Family Health Insurance Plan â€“ Complaint Management

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Family Health Insurance Plan.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can subscribe Family Health Insurance Plan by outbound call.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Previously Family Health Insurance Plan was known as Family Health Takaful</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Before lodging mis-selling complaint agent must customer below three questions:</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Kya app ko insurance ke charges 2950 btaye gaya tha ka.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">App ko btay gae thay iss kay faiday.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">App ko recording line pah sunwaia gia tha kay 2950 kay avas service active kee ja rai ha.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer answers No to any of the above questions, the agent will process a Mis-Selling Complaint (refer to scenario 1.2).</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer answers Yes to all three questions, the agent will then ask whether the customer wants a reversal.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer wants a reversal, the agent will process a Request Reversal Complaint (refer to scenario 1.4).</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Reversal can only be processed within the lock-free period of 14 days after successful subscription.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan â€“ Complaint Management

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Once insurance is subscribed amount cannot be reversed.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a customer complains about mis-selling, the agent will inform the customer that by providing digital consent, you have subscribed to the insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer still insists that incorrect information was provided by the insurance representative, the agent will ask for the specific information or benefits shared with the customer. After validating the concern, if the issue is found valid, the agent will lodge a complaint and document the complete issue of mis-selling details in the complaint remarks.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For all cases where complaint is still in pending state and complaint TAT is over follow Escalation to Backend process.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></li>
</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">15 Working Day</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top; width:311px">

			</td>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>:&nbsp;NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>:<br />
	NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></p>

			</td>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17815

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ JazzCash App Login â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with JazzCash App Login.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer is unable to login his JazzCash App due to OTP Fetching issue below are the mandatory checks</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Android:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For OTP fetch, sim need to be in slot 1 and in same device.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All JazzCash App permissions need to be allowed to auto-fetch.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device Need to be PTA Approved</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">App need to be Updated</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer has not received the in-app &quot;allow app permissions&quot; popup while receiving OTP, advise the customer to reinstall the app and then retry.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer has already received the OTP 3 times on the same day, OTP Limit being exhausted and the OTP is not fetched, customer should wait for 24 hours before attempting to re-submit.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer has performed all checks and still facing issue, it is highly likely that customer is facing issue due to some issue in handset itself. Politely request the customer to change handset and check.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">IOS:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Iphone does not auto-fetch OTP while logging into JazzCash app.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">User will have to click on auto-fill option from keypad within 10 seconds</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">App needs to be updated to the latest version</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer has already received the OTP 3 times on the same day OTP Limit being exhausted and the OTP is not fetched, customer should wait for 24 hours before attempting to re-submit</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer has performed all checks and still facing issue, it is highly likely that customer is facing issue due to some issue in handset itself. Politely request the customer to change handset and check.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:43px">&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent must inform customer that 8558 number should not be in Blocked List</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To remove the number 8558 from your blocked list from your phone, please follow these steps as per table 1.0:</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">If customer is not receiving 8558 notification below are the step to enable as per table 1.0 </span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:43px">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite to Complaint scenarios</span></span></strong></a></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS and NADRA only</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction&gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS Search <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction&gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#e74c3c">System Navigation</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Review Transaction&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></span></p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Zakat Exemption & Certificate â€“ Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with the zakat declaration and zakat exemption certificate.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Zakat exemption is a state of being free from the obligation to pay Zakat, a religious obligation for Muslims who meet certain criteria.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">On subscribed saving plan zakat will be deducted from customer account.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer can exempt himself from zakat deduction simply by USSD &amp; App (Refer to How to Processes 2.1)</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Where customer is unable to exempt his Zakat via App/USSD agent will process complaint where he is unable to exempt Zakat and will also proceed complaint for Zakat Exemption.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer must exempt his Zakat before 1<sup>st</sup> Shaban as Zakat will be deducted on 1<sup>st</sup> Shaban. As per current Nisab. If he exempts his Zakat after 1<sup>st</sup> Shaban then Zakat will be deducted for current year and customer will exempted from Zakat for the next year.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

			</td>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">JazzCash Zakat Deduction &ndash;<strong> </strong>Refund Required</span></span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:white; vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">2 Working Day</span></span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Konnect &gt;</span></span></span><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">&gt; </span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks</span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: </span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Device Registration Without BVS Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">This process is to allow customers to register their device without biometric verification (BVS) in cases where they face issues during device registration. The process applies to customers who submit complaints via the helpline.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Issue List</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">:</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer is unable to log in to their JazzCash app due to Unikrew BVS failure.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer is disabled, which prevents them from completing Unikrew verification in the JazzCash app.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Front- End Handling: </u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Process:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Ask Customer whether he is using updated JazzCash app or not.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">JazzCash App updated = Yes</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Ask customer that Jazz Cash App permission (Camera) is allowed.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">JazzCash App permission allowed = Yes</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Ask the customer for specific details regarding the issue when performing Unikrew for device change.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Error Valid = Yes</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">If the handling has been followed as per the Unikrew process error handling but the issue still persists</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt">,</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt"> proceed with further.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer calling from same cli= <strong>No</strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">The agent will guide the customer to call from the same number so that their complaint can be lodged and the issue can be resolved.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer calling from same cli= <strong>Yes</strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Proceed with complaint registration in service now</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Note: Agent during lodging the complaint will confirm the&nbsp;below details from the customer and fill the required LOv&rsquo;s in complain accordingly.</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="list-style-type:none">
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Customer Mobile Type/Model</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">OS of Mobile (IOS/Android)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">Version of the App</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:#333333">Service Now</span></strong><strong><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;&gt;&gt; Report MMBL Issue &gt;&gt; CC-DFS &gt;&gt; Category: </span></strong><strong><span style="color:#333333">Device Registration Fall Back Complaint</span></strong><strong><span style="color:#333333"> &gt;&gt; Sub Category: </span></strong><strong><span style="color:#333333">BVS Failure</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">After complaint registration, the agent will guide the customer to share their <strong>CNIC front and back pictures</strong> along with the <strong>complaint </strong></span><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt">ID</span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt">, which they will receive either during or after the call, with us on our official WhatsApp channel <strong>0325-4444786</strong> from their registered JazzCash account number so that their complaint can be processed further.</span> </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">If the customer is disabled, the agent will also inform them to share their <strong>NADRA disability certificate</strong></span><span style="font-size:10.5pt">.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt">The agent will inform the customer that once they share the required details on WhatsApp, it will take up to 3</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt"> working</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt"> days for processing</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">TAT: </span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">3 working Days</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Work Code:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;JazzCash Device Change - Unikrew Enablement</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>WhatsApp Channel Complaint Handling:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Once the customer shares their details with us on WhatsApp.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">The WhatsApp agent will validate the customer&rsquo;s concern and perform the following check:</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">The MSISDN from which the customer has shared the details must be their registered JazzCash account number.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">The agent will validate the complaint ID shared by the customer in ServiceNow to ensure that the complaint has been lodged regarding the Unikrew issue from same MSISDN.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">The agent will validate whether the customer has already contacted regarding a Unikrew complaint within the last 30 days. (The agent will validate the 30-day check by considering the go-live date of this process as the starting point. Any Device Change complaints before the go-live date will not be counted in the 30-day validation.)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">If the customer&#39;s request is received again within 30 days after the go-live of this process, the agent will guide the customer to wait for the completion of the 30-day period.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Additionally, the agent will attach the customer&#39;s <strong>CNIC (front &amp; back)</strong> to the complaint in ServiceNow and will route these tickets to <strong>CC-DFS</strong>.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Agent will provide <strong>3 working days</strong> TAT to customer.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#3c8dbc">Check Complaint remarks</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#3c8dbc">: Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></a></p>

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Asaan Digital Remittance Account .</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can upgrade L1 account/ADA/ADRA account to Asaan Digital Remittance Account (ADRA) through JazzCash App.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">L0/FDA/L2 account cannot be upgraded to ADRA.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139326304"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Payoneer-linked account cannot be upgraded to ADRA. Customer must first de-link their account.</span></span></a></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Konnect&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks: </span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Konnect&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17882

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ SpEidi- Complaint Doc
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">SpEidi feature is a special initiative designed to enhance the spirit of Eid by enabling users to send and receive Eidi virtually.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This feature aims to improve user engagement on our platform by providing a seamless way to share Eid greetings and gifts. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This process will Cover all the Process related to SpEidi.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Important Points:</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>When the sender changes their MPIN/account status changed and recipient tries to redeem it, following scenarios will take place</em></span></span></li>
</ol>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>On first try of redemption, amount will be reversed to the sender in real time.</em></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>On second and onwards try of redemption by the same user or by any other user, amount will go to &lsquo;Pending Authorized&rsquo; state and will be reversed to sender after 15 days of transaction initiation<span style="color:#156082">. </span></em></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#156082">Communication in scenarios where amount is in &lsquo;Pending Authorized&rsquo; due to above stated issue.</span></em></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#156082">Sender is to be communicated that the amount will be reversed to their account in 15 days (remaining days from the transaction initiation date)</span></em></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#156082">Recipient is to be communicated that the amount will be reversed to sender&rsquo;s account (remaining days from the transaction initiation date).</span></em></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ol start="2">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>If the receiver gets an error stating the amount will be reversed to the sender, but the funds are not reversed, what should CC agents communicate?</em></span></span></li>
</ol>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>Before 15 days are completed, user is to be communicated that amount will be reversed to sender&rsquo;s account in X days (remaining days from the transaction initiation date)</em></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:72px">&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#156082">After 15 days have passed from the date of transaction, and funds were not reversed to the sender, in that case the complaint will go to ITFS.</span></em></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:96px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>&nbsp;</em></span></span></p>

<ol start="3">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>For account closure &amp; change of MSISDN : In both cases, usual process that is currently being followed should continue (e.g. account balance should be zero in case of account closure etc.). However, if the customer requests to cancel the transaction for any reason, that cannot be catered manually before 15 days, so agent will ask the customer to wait for 15 days (or remaining days from the date of transaction).</em></span></span></li>
</ol>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Table 1.0</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

			<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">T&amp;C</span></span></span></span></p>

			</td>

	</tbody>
</table>

			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Eidi Already Redeemed</span></strong></span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:9.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Your Eidi has already been added to your account.</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">When user has successfully redeemed Eidi but due to entries not populated, this error comes</span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">When user presses okay, the status changes to redeemed, so shouldn&rsquo;t be an issue.</span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Transaction Not Available</span></strong></span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:9.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Transaction not available, please request the sender again</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">When Eidi send was cancelled i.e: amount wasn&rsquo;t sent, but due to error in entries, it is reflected in to be redeemed, user will be shown this error.</span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:200px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">When user selects okay, entries are correctly populated, and this entry would disappear from redeem section.</span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span><br />
<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></span><br />
<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:</span></span></span>&nbsp;<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span><br />
<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal</span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: </span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span><br />
<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span><br />
<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks:</span></span></span>&nbsp;<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ CVM Cashback Reward Redemption â€“ Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with CVM cashback reward redeem feature.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139326304"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Redeemable cashback feature will be used exclusively for CVM campaigns. Other campaigns, such as Balance Maintenance, are excluded.</span></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Previously, cashback amounts from CVM campaigns were directly added to the customer&#39;s account upon meeting the campaign requirements.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">With this feature enablement, customers must redeem the cashback amount within 72 hours after it is posted.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">If not redeemed within 72 hours, the cashback amount will expire.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>
