<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139318604"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Check Complaint Status:&nbsp;</span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139318615"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">Check Complaint remarks</span></strong></a><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#3c8dbc">: Konnect&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click History Tab&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></p>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17928

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Tap Pay via Google Wallet App â€“ Complaint Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This complaint management process will cover scenarios related to issues with Payment via (Tap Pay via Google Wallet App)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Google Pay (Google Wallet) is a digital wallet that enables secure, contactless payments using NFC-supported Android smartphones. Users can store their JazzCash Mastercard debit cards for quick and seamless transactions.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can add their MasterCard, Women&rsquo;s MasterCard, and Virtual Card to the Google Wallet app.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">By setting Google Wallet as the default payment method, customers can simply unlock their phone and tap on the payment terminal to complete the transaction&mdash;no need to log into the JazzCash app</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To use Google Wallet with JazzCash, customers need:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A Google Account</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">An NFC-supported Android phone</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A JazzCash Mastercard debit card</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap Pay via Google Wallet App is only available on android devices.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk139326304">Before logging the complaint below, the agent must first ask the customer whether their card is added to Google Wallet. If the card is already added or the customer is unable to add it, proceed with the complaint as outlined below.</a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer perform normal Tap Pay transaction via JazzCash refer to <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17659" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17659</a>.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136358794"></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks:</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ID: 17944

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Beneficiary/Retailer PSPA Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP covers the PSPA Aaghosh Program payment disbursement through JazzCash.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Eligible women beneficiaries receive up to PKR 23,000 based on PSPA-determined eligibility.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A Limited Mandate Account (LMA) is created, and funds are disbursed in real-time to this account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Funds can only be withdrawn via BVS-enabled retailers using original CNIC and biometric verification. List attached for reference.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agents will check CNIC status via CPS and guide the beneficiary; if needed, transfer the call to ext. 146004 and punch the relevant workcode.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">PSPA account will not be closed from helpline if beneficiary request for account closure guide him to contact PSPA helpline(1221).</span></span></li>
</ul>
